resp.text: Hi Robert, I’m sorry we let you leave our store without a great experience. If there’s anything we can do for you, please reach out to americasbest@nationalvision.com with your contact information and the store you visited. Thank you for your feedback. – Nancy

name: River camp customs
text: Had my glasses I ordered at there store for 2 days and I had to call them to find out what was going on to figure out that they have already came in. Horrible management, never going there again!

resp.text: Hi Alex, I’m very sorry that happened. I’d like to have someone from corporate management reach out to you and have the opportunity to make this right. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: ellmarie McClain
text: I went there and they told me over the phone that the 69.99 included 2 pair of glasses for single vision.  I have single vision with astigmatism which is still single vision.  My price went from 69.99,to 90.00+45+59.99 for 1 pair of glasses.  False advertising and makes you waste time and gas to be disappointed.

resp.text: Hi Ellmarie, I'm very sorry you had a disappointing visit. The offer is for 2 pairs, if you only got 1, the exam is not free. I would be happy to put you in touch with someone from corporate management if you are interested. Just email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com with your contact information and which store you visited. Thank you. – Nancy

name: KING HAILESELASIYA
text: No customer service at all.

resp.text: Hi King Haileselasiya, I’m sorry you had a poor experience with us.  I would be happy to put you in touch with someone from corporate management if you are interested. Just email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com. It’s very important to include your name, the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Marion McCloud
text: False advertising

resp.text: Hi Marion, I’m very sorry to hear this. I'd be happy to have someone from corporate management reach out to you and help with any questions you may have or you can visit our website at www.americasbest.com. If you’d like, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com, I'm happy to help.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Billie Dill
text: This is the most amazing experience I've ever had.  They are not only: extremely professional and competent,  they are kind,  attentive and actually, caring. I have never had such clear glasses that I didn't have to take back 4 times to get them where I could see, like most other places I've used before. And they are the most affordable on top of everything else that's so incredible about them. I am telling everyone I know and I will "NEVER" go anywhere else for my eye care. I love this place and the people who work here. I am, a life long customer.

name: SOFRINA Shepard
text: I have nothing but appreciation for the service I received today at the Eyemart Express on Gadsden Hwy. Cheryl patiently helped me as I struggled to choose the glasses I wanted, and she helped me stay within my budget. Although she was the primary person helping me, the others--Donna and the manager (?)--enthusiastically chimed in to offer suggestions.  I have NEVER seen such a personable group of professionals.  It is service like this that will keep me coming back!  I have been a patient here since 2013 and I've always been pleased.  However, these three ladies have been so phenomenal on the last two visits to the store that I had to share my appreciation!! Well done, and thank you!!

resp.text: Awesome! That's exactly what we like to hear - we hope to see you again soon!

name: Melissa Coffman
text: Kimberly was amazing!! They were very busy with the phone ringing off the hookahs store busy with customers but she didn’t miss a stride!! She remembered your first name as if you had known her for years! Made sure I knew that she hadn’t forgot about me in all the hustle and bustle. Very personal and caring. Dr. Irwin also great! The entire staff very friendly and welcoming. They make you feel very comfortable and you know they are taking good care of you!!

resp.text: Awesome! That's exactly what we like to hear - we hope to see you again soon!

name: Jared S.
text: Went in to schedule an appointment and tell them what the issue with my eyes are. The doctor (tall gray haired white guy wearing glasses) said “that makes zero sense, get the hell out of my store now”. I was extremely polite when I walked in and he shoved me out of the store. I have a problem with driving in the rain at night and tried to explain to him when he asked me what was going on with my vision. I don’t know what his attitude was for and forcing me out of the store but definitely do not recommend them after the brief experience I had.

resp.text: Hi Jared S. We never like to hear that you had a less than stellar experience in any part of the process. Unfortunately, the doctor and their staff are not employed by us, and we recommend that you reach out to their office directly to address your concerns.

name: yolibeth ruiz
text: Just left this place happy as ever. I’ve dealt with them twice already and the staff could not have been nicer. Cheryl was amazing, and saving was a plus.. would recommend!

resp.text: Hi yolibeth ruiz! Thank you for your review! We hope to see you again soon! 😊

name: Kim Ouellette
text: Really good experience at the Trussville Eyemart Express.  Thorough eye exam and friendly staff.  Dr Irwin is great.  Prompt and professional.  All the staff were very attentive to my needs and I never felt rushed.  I will be back.

name: Tamara Wetzel
text:
Before going to Eye Mart Express, I checked out their website.   So I had an idea of what I wanted before I got there.  I was impressed by their cleanliness and the measures taken during this pandemic to keep the customers as safe as possible.  I found the glasses quickly.  The price was great.  I even got a second pair  that day.  They were ready in 42 minutes.
Over all great experience.  Fast, right price,
knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Hi Tamara Wetzel! Mission accomplished! Thank you for your 5-star review! 🙌

name: Denise Bates
text: I went to the store with my prescription and ordered glasses, biggest mistake ever. First thing I picked up my glasses on a Monday two days later my lens fell out, they offered to order me another pair. The new pair came and I went to picked them up. I noticed when I put them on that I could not see clearly, they made several adjustments and I left with the glasses because I had to return to work but throughout the day I still had trouble seeing clearly. The next morning I put the glasses back on and still no clear vision. I returned to the store later that morning, they made several more adjustments and still no clear vision. I now have a pair of glasses that I paid money for and can not wear, tried to return the glasses and was told that they do not do refunds. I researched eyemart return policy and it clearly states that they do offer refunds.

resp.text: Hi Denise Bates. Thank you for your feedback. We hate to see that you did not have a 5-star experience. Please feel free to reach out to the store at 205-661-3030 and ask to speak with our manager Kimberley, so we may have the opportunity to make this right.

name: Juan Gutirrez
text: Super fast service, great guarantee, competitive prices and more importantly,, 've been wearing glasses for 20 years and I'd never seen so well, the Dr at Trussville is hands down the best. Definitely coming back

resp.text: Awesome! That's exactly what we like to hear - we hope to see you again soon!

name: Conswella Davis
text: The staff is always so friendly and courteous. I am always in there regarding glasses for my kids. They would gladly repair their glasses on sight if possible. This time I finally came in to have my eyes checked. My exam started on schedule and the staff assisted me with much patience to help me find the glasses that I really like. I always have a great experience every time I visit even if I receive good news (can replace with protection plan) or bad news (prescription expired or protection plan just expired). They are out of network but I am always pleased with the staff and speedy service.

name: Ronnie Setzer
text: Very fast and friendly. They finished my two pairs in under an hour. This place is out of network for my insurance, but i still paid less than I would have with an in network location. This place is great if you need glasses quick when your in a pinch.

name: Suzanne Evans
text: The  associated were very helpful...and very patient.   They had several good suggestions and weren't pushy.  The turn around time was excellent.   Will go back for sure !

name: Darlene Robertson
text:
They let me take the time I needed to decide on the style that I wanted and were helpful.
They were really fast getting my two pair of glasses ready. I appreciate the team and service

name: Monique Roberts
text: Very nice variety of frames; the staff was even nicer. Their timing was impeccable. I was in and out in less than hour, and my frames were ready in 30 minutes! Best experience I've ever had at the optometrist.

resp.text: Hi Monique Roberts! Mission accomplished!

name: jordan allen
text: This is the mcdonald's of glasses stores I specifically ask for a durable pair of glasses because of my job and and the glasses I get doesn't even last ama now Ik that when I'm trying to get glasses I should just decide durability on my own because they sold me a pair of frames that has screws in on the lens sides

resp.text: Hi jordan allen. Thank you for your feedback. We pride in excellent quality and hate to hear that you are not satisfied with your glasses. If there is anything that we can do, please feel free to reach out to us at help@eyemartexpress.com.

name: Katlyn Norris
text: Fabulous experience! Dr. Erwin did a thorough eye exam. Brittany was so kind, patient, and willing to find the best cost-effective glasses on my budget. After getting my new prescription, I was able to see perfectly! Highly recommend!

name: Amber Huffstutler
text: Zero stars for this place!!!  Dr was a complete jerk to patients and staff. Front desk people were very rude as well..me:Ma'am, do you have youth size frames.  She looked right at me and walked off.

name: gin2772
text:
I came in with my dad 3 days ago for him to get an exam & get new glasses. I had already had an exam elsewhere, but did not have my prescription with me. I told them this. I said when I come back with my dad to get his glasses the next day, I'll have it with me. I had picked out the frames I wanted.

They were all so super nice & helpful to my dad. They took proper time with his insurance, fitting, asking him all kinds of questions about what he wanted & everything.

When we came back the next day, the lady didn't ask for my insurance, rushed through me & she didn't ask me any of the kinds of questions she asked my dad, like did I want tinted lens or anything else. When I asked how she knew what to charge me when she didn't even bother to see what insurance I had or what discounts I may be eligible for, she said it was because I said yesterday that I did not have insurance. That is a total lie & doesn't make any sense on so many levels. I had to wait a while on my dad the day before, so why not just go ahead & get glasses while I'm waiting if insurance was the only issue? When you apply, doesn't it take a while to kick in? If I didn't have it the day before, then I probably wouldn't have had it the day after either.

She just wanted to scam me for some reason. I agree with some of these other reviews that said these people are scammers. It's like they make up their mind about you right after you walk in the door. They must have liked my dad, but decided to try to scam me.

I work for the federal government just like my dad. I have good insurance just like he does, but they decided to treat me like either a loser who still lives at home with their parents even though I am 42 or a total homeless bum. Well, if that's the case, then how could I have paid for my glasses? I guess my dad would have because in their minds I am a loser who still needs my parents funds to survive. I could not believe they were so nice to him & so horrible to me. Keep on driving when you see this place.

name: Jim Perkins
text:
Brittany is a outstanding assistant,  great personality. She was so helpful, and service oriented!!
Super employee!!

name: Lacy Watts
text: I had never been to Eyemart before and started second guessing if we should get my son’s glasses here. I didn’t really care for the boys section but we did find one pair everyone was happy with. The staff was friendly and took very good care of us. We got them within an hour, it was nice to know I didn’t have to go back to town for them.

name: Sarah Miller
text: I love this place!! Because we got toddler glasses it was supposed to take 2 hours. 42 minutes later I got a message saying my daughter's glasses were done. The lady that helped us went as far as to pray for/over my daughter. Which I loved that right there will have me coming back.

name: Bernadette Stanley
text: Great customer service.. Also with this Virus we’ll dealing with now. The staff was very clean and organized and Friendly with the public.

name: Natalie Heard
text: I loved my experience with them. They took the time to help me pick out my frames. Then when the lady fitted me for my glasses she was very thorough. They told me a promise time that my glasses would be done and also they would text me when they were ready to be picked up. My glasses were ready before the time they told me and they did text me when I needed to pick them up. When I picked them up they fit so well. She made me try on the glasses and made sure they were comfortable for me. But for me the most impressive thing was the price. I got 2 pair of trifocal glasses for about 140 dollars. I would recommend anyone and everyone to use this company just an all around great experience.

name: Dianne Hancock
text: Not only are my glasses perfect in every way but the value was exceptional too . The tech was wonderful, very professional and helpful.  I thought they did a great job keeping everyone as safe as possible during this pandemic.

name: Wayne Perry
text: They were very nice and inviting, very helpful, and patient, while I decided on the frame I picked out. The prescription, they produced was spot on correct, I had no problems at all. I would recommend them to anybody every day of the week.

name: Stacey Killian
text: I was very happy with my experience with Eyemart Express in Trussville, All, so far. I got my prescription readers same day. They are great. It's taking longer for my special order progressive lenses but I'm expecting to be satisfied with them as well.

name: Hilton Wiggins
text: In and out in minutes and had my glasses ready 30 minutes before they were scheduled. My sales person was polite and knowledgeable, even showed me how to save money. Definitely recommend!

name: Faye27 (Faye27)
text: The wait time for my appointment and the eye exam wasn't long. The staff and eye doctor were great. Both pair of my glasses fit perfect. And my glasses were ready in less week. I highly recommend Eye Mart in Trussville.

name: Lance Bailey
text: Dr Irwin  took time and discussed my history. He did a thorough examination and was very courteous. The ladies in the eye glass dept. Were very attentive and helpful. They explained all of my options and were efficient in getting the order written up and to the lab. The lab had both pairs of my glasses were ready in an hour and one half. Glasses have been great

name: Renee Dickie
text: Excellent experience overall! Friendly staff and helpful. They have quality frames at reasonable prices and a good selection. Will continue to do business with them. This was the Trussville, Al store.

name: Alex Holt
text: I had such a great experience at this location. The workers were very friendly and helped me with all my needs! Also the turnaround was so quick! I literally got two pairs of prescription glasses in under 20 minutes, and the prices were great! 5 stars!

resp.text: Your satisfaction is very important to us and we are glad we could provide great customer service. We will share your feedback with management. If you have any question please do not hesitate to contact us at 888-372-2763. Thank you! Taylor, Eyemart Customer Care Team

name: Mary Schreiner
text: I had a great experience at Eyemart. I had my eye exam and picked out and was fitted for my glasses in just a little over an hour. The staff was very knowledgeable and friendly. I was told my glasses would be ready in 2 hours but received a text message that they were ready 71 minutes later. I am very happy with my glasses. This is my second time purchasing glasses from Eyemart. I highly recommend them and will go back again.

name: Letitia Lewis
text: My insurance is not in the Eyemart network, but I have been going to this location (Gadsden Hwy) for several years, because I can always find what I need. (I am hard to please) On this visit I was assisted by a young lady name Cheryl, she took the time to help me pick out 2 pair of glasses along with a pair of shades. She also took the time to explain the billing process as well. She was very knowledgeable of her job and of the products. I love outstanding customer service and that exactly what I received from Cheryl!

resp.text: Hello, Letitia! Thank you for giving us a 5-star rating! I am forwarding your compliment over to the store now. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.  Moncella, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

name: Elmetrice Robinson
text: I was very happy with my service and my eye were just great ,all the customs service works were professional and friendly welling to please.Thank you all foe your help. E Robinson.

name: Davina Smith
text: I would just like to say, this location is top notch! I was greeted at the door, with smiles. I could see they were busy, but they didn't make me feel rushed. The lady that assisted me was awesome in helping  find the style of glasses I wanted. She was very helpful in calming my fear of the progressive lens. She instructed me on how to look through them, and how to walk down stairs. I would highly recommend this location to my friends, and family. Keep up the great customer service! I will return for future purchases. Thank you!

text: I Was There With My Mom And Her Glasses Were Done Before An Hour I Had My Prescription Faxed And I Bought Two Pair Of Glasses And Had Them On Within An Hour I Recommend Everyone To Come Shop With Them Their Staff Is Very Professional And Its Kid Friendly

name: Brenda Long
text: Service was quick.  Staff verified my insurance benefits while I browsed,  so I knew what my out of pocket costs would be. My single lens were ready in less than an hour.

name: Eric Poole
text: I love my spare pair and I'm waiting on the main pair because they couldn't get them ready. They had to order them. That's the only reason I didn't give you a 5 star rating

name: Darrell Reese
text: I really appreciate the honesty and integrity of the staff. They were very professional and took a personal interest in me. Dr. Erwin was direct with the eye examination and gave appropriate recommendation. Thanks for the eye glasses. Keep up the good work 😊😊

text: I had never been there before and I had a great experience. I went to the store in Trussville and Tammy was extremely sweet and helpful! It literally took an hour for them to get my two pairs of glasses ready that I got for a great price! The lady who I believe made them was super helpful too... she made sure I could see out of both pair and that they fit my face correctly. I will be going there to get my glasses for now on!

resp.text: Hello, Chanley! Thank you for giving us a 5-star rating! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.  Moncella, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

name: Richard Alston
text: Technicians were very helpful. Prices were very good. Glasses were delivered quickly and were made accurately.

name: Robert Bates
text: The staff was very polite and knowledgeable of the products and process associated with the eyewear they carry. My wife and I were excited about our visit and will continue to visit for all of our eyewear needs. Thanks Staff

name: David Parrish
text: Needed an extra pair of glasses... Without insurance, I Purchased two pair for 25% of the cost I paid for a single pair with insurance a few months ago. Yes, I used the inexpensive frames.. for which I've had two people already volunteer that they liked the new glasses... Plastic lenses with no special coatings (these are after all back-up extra glasses)... These have become my primary glasses... Well satisfied. Great value... Oh.. and they were ready in less than 2 hours!  :>)

name: Vikki Taylor
text: Excellent service.Professional and genuinely care about your well being.Good price and friendly atmosphere.Will recommend to all my friends.

name: Rikesha Foster
text:
Not quite sure what to make of this place. My sales clerk, Phyllis, was helpful about the type of frame I should get according to my face structure....after I was looking around about 20 minutes. When I entered the shop, I told her I needed a quote for frames and lenses, and without even looking up, she told me to pick out some frames and we would go from there. I asked Phyllis shouldn't she at least look at my prescription since it was pretty strong because I knew all frames don't work with all prescriptions. She glances at my prescription and says" Oh yeah, it is pretty strong", and tells me to stay away from rimless and metal frames. I really should have left then and went somewhere else, but decided to look around. Phyllis comes to assist after about 20 minutes. She brings over about four pair of frames for me to try and critiqued each one . I narrowed my choices down to the pair I really liked. As I was getting fitted, due to my special prescription, I was quoted a time of 14 days. Insert sad face here. Oh well, that's the price I pay for being a nerd and reading all those books in dim light as a youngster.

My glasses came back in about 10 days. After trying them on and getting them adjusted, I discover my right lens is scratched / cracked smack dab in the middle . While they agree to reorder the lens, I am quoted another 14 days for it to come back. Phyllis suggests that I go ahead and wear this pair to get used to them and when my new lens comes in, they will just switch the damaged lens out. I'm disappointed to say the least, but happy to get new glasses I was well over due for. Needless to say, after my replacement lens comes in, I won't be coming back to this location ever again.

resp.text: Hello Rikesha! Thank you for your review. We are very sorry your didn't have the best experience and I will make sure this is addressed with the management team to make sure we learn from this situation.   Please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer care department at 1-888-372-2763 if there is anything we can do to improve your experience. Thank you! Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

name: Myra Brothers
text: Kimberly was great helping me pick glasses! My glasses fit great, and look wonderful! I’m a repeat customer and will be again! Thank you, Myra Brothers!

text:
I totally enjoyed my experience getting my two new pair of glasses. There was a minor misunderstanding but the staff offered an alternative solution and I am very happy with the look and the style of my glasses not to mention I can see now!! I will recommend Eye Mart Express to anyone that is looking for glasses. I most definitely will be back for more, the selection was awesome.
Donna Potts
The Trussville Location

text: Very satisfied with my new glasses and the customer service was amazing!!! From start to finish I was out the door in less than an hour and a half with 2 new pair of glasses.

name: Libby Adkins
text: The customer service at Eyemart Express in Trussville was superb! From eye exam to picking up BOTH pairs of my son’s glasses took less than two hours. Knowing that there is also a year’s worth of protection on the lenses AND frames already built into the price was a huge bonus I was very pleased with. They also suggested an add on purchase of lens cleanser that has LIFETIME refills! HUGE bonus! Overall, excellent customer service, friendly, smiling faces from the time we arrived until we walked out with my son’s new glasses.

text: Going to Eyemart Express was quick and easy.  Was seen and done within an hour. Plus my 2 pair of glasses were done within the next hour. Prices are great even without insurance.

text: Went on a Saturday afternoon...Great experience and fast, friendly service! Yolanda was professional & knowledgeable in assisting us with our eyewear selection. Our glasses were ready in less than 30 minutes and we have no complaints. Highly recommend the Trussville location!

text: This is the first time I've visited an Eyemart Express.  I was very pleased with the service.  Kimberly was very helpful and professional.  Great prices and good customer service.

name: Ronnie Ferguson
text: Best eye care center I've been to in all my years.  Super friendly staff.

name: Mark
text: I carried my current prescription into Eyemart express and had a pair of eyeglasses made. Once I tried on the new glasses. I could not see with the newly made glasses. I explained it to the Manager Kimberly Dials. That they added someone else prescription into my glasses or something was not correct. She takes my new glasses to the back and comes back and tell me to try them on again. This time they had red marking on them. She then tells me that the glasses are correct.(that I have not doubt) I tell her I can’t see with them correct or not. She then tell me to take the glasses home and start wearing them first thing in the morning. Reason is was late in the day and my eyes were tired this was a new prescription. She then tell me to take the glasses to my eye doctor and have him look at the new glasses. I did not tell her that I have another pair of glasses with the same prescription that was made at a different retailer that I have no issues with. Eyemart express does not want to admit they made a mistake by adding someone else’s prescription into a pair of glasses I had made.

name: Gregg Mitchell
text: Excellent staff, very informative .My first pair of glasses and the staff made me feel very comfortable. Thank you Eyemart.

name: John Heiser
text: Good prices and usually good service. But the last time I got glasses there (two pairs of single-vision, same prescription, and a third pair, single vision), the technician mistakenly (carelessly?) swapped the left and right eye prescriptions. At first, I thought it was just "hey, it's a new prescription I just need to get used to," but ultimately I took them back and the problem was discovered. They took care of it at no charge. Still....

name: gh ph
text: Great selection, great prices, great, fast service!

name: Pat Brasher
text: The employees were nice. Smiling.interested.helpful.

name: Candous Langston
text: Excellent customer service and fantastic prices!!! They helped me find glasses that were stylish and fit my budget. Thank you!!!

resp.text: Hello, Candous! Thank you for giving us a 5-star rating! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.  Moncella, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

name: Laurel Thornton
text: Dr Irwin ... Good man. Could not believe how bright the sun was until my eyes were dialated. All the representatives are friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Pam Everidge
text: Everyone was very helpful. Love my new glasses and sunglasses

name: Francesca Core-Rodgers
text: I love this place. They have awesome prices and excellent customer service. It's worth the drive.

name: Donald Richardson
text: The glasses are nice and the service was outstanding. The staff was very friendly patient and willing to help I would recommend them.

name: Michelle Prewitt
text: Great eyewear for low price. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I will be going back.

resp.text: Hello Michelle, thank you so much for taking the time to rate and review your local Eyemart Express store. We appreciate your business, and we look forward to assisting you in the future. Thank you, Sahaad - Eyemart Express Customer Care Team.

name: Dezi Dillard
text: Great service. Very fast. Awesome prices.

name: Leslie Cutler
text: Cherly was amazing helping me find 2 glasses that fit my face . I had broken mine the week prior and got all taken care of in 2 hrs . I will be back for my eye care needs in the future

name: J.M. Jones
text: They understood a difficult order and delievered within 3 hours.   Very happy with them

name: connie calvert
text: Didn't expect to walk in and be taken care of so wonderfully. But I was and am looking good in my new glasses and sun glasses. Thanks for your friendlyness and help in every way. I'll surely be back and spead my experience with everyone.

name: Brenda McCullough
text: I loved Dr. Irwin. Then I tried to get glasses and that was were the problems started. I was going to get 2 pairs of glasses one being sunglasses. By the time they added everything to them it was going to be over $500. Also the lab was behind and I was going to have wait to 2 weeks to get my glasses. I live in Oneonta, Al and went to Eye Mart Express so I could get my glasses in one day. Your advertising is very misleading. In fact I think your lying to people. Needless to say I will never be back and I would not recommend your establishment to anyone. It was a total waste of my time.

name: Henry Landscape & Turf Care
text: They were done in a hurry same day and as promised ! Actually done in half the time I was impressed I can see lol ! And love my new glasses ! This is about the trid or 4th time to use them I recommend stop here and go no futher !! They warranty things others don’t and me being a landscaper I am ruff on things at work it’s just the job they have never complained about fixing and I have offered to Pay at times but they repaired for free !! Yes it is a 20 star rating !!

name: Angel Taylor
text: Excellent staff. Fast service. Glasses were ready in 10 minutes.

name: Penny babin
text: Everyone was super nice HOWEVER got there round three (was suppose to have got and paid for on around the 3rd but i was brrroke so i went today) anywho round three or so left and now i have to wait till in the morning..The moral of the story is either its not a hr service when glasses are ready ...Or....Have your cash the day of your appointment  and get them the day of your appointment in the hour...

name: M Chambers
text: My husband and I both came in for I exams and new glasses we were very satisfied with the service and the products thank you very much

name: Renee Leslie
text: All the girls are great here!!  Fast and friendly!!

name: william gulledge
text: The Dr visit was great but the service up front, Cristal was who waited on me was very rude and short speaking

resp.text:
Hello William, thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry you had a negative experience and I will make sure this is addressed and corrected. Please let us know if there is anything else I can assist you with. help@eyemartexpress.com

Regards,

Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Manager

name: Hartwig Raphael
text: Great service, great prices.

name: Mary Doss
text: We had a great experience, already had a Rx for glasses. Went in picked out a couple of pair of glasses and they were ready to be picked up within an hour of leaving the store.

name: Rex Weaver
text: Friendly, knowledgeable, and eager to please.  Excellent Value..

name: Ray Brooks
text: Great prices, selection, customer service and turnaround time!!!

name: Marsha Smith-Horstead
text: Brittany was fabulous.

name: Beth M
text: Went to the Trussville Eyemart yesterday to pick up my glasses. I had sun glasses and regular glasses both made with progressive lenses. the left side looked very blurry when I put them on. They checked my prescription and concluded that the glasses were made correctly.  A very knowledgeable lady named Felisha concluded that the Opthamologist who gave the script had written a plus sign instead of a minus in front of the left eye on the script. They checked it with my old glasses to be sure. They are now remaking both pairs of glasses with the correct prescription for free!  What a great catch!  Thanks to all the people who helped me at the store.

name: M Adams
text:
I had a very pleasant experience at the Trussville Eyemart yesterday. Unfortunately, my lenses were not in stock so they are being ordered - which is why there is a 4* not 5. When I was ready to complete my order, I had 3 frames I was deciding between and Ashley and the receptionist for the Doctor were very helpful (and unanimous) in pointing me towards the frames I chose.
The final pricing was very fair for stylish lenses with a high prescription (there was no choice to not get polycarbonate lenses). I was almost swayed to purchase the second pair, but I do not wear glasses enough (mostly contacts) to warrant buying them. The pricing structure was interesting, and it would make sense for someone who had a very basic prescription, and not for someone who needs a higher quality frame, or the extras (anti-reflective, etc).
I would recommend Eyemart in Trussville, and am looking forward to receiving my pair of glasses!

name: Leshon Speights
text: The staff was very kind and professional. They waited on us and even got the glasses right before closing. That’s what you call customer service!

name: Glenn Anthony
text: Great experience and got my glasses back the same day.

name: candi Guy
text:
Awesome prices, great quality and Top notch customer service.
I will always use Eye Mart Express.

name: Jimmie Chapman
text: I received great service by Yolanda and Valerie thanks for your friendly and knowledgeable service

name: Amber Watson
text: Worst customer service ever. We paid outrageous amount of money and they didn't give us what we paid for. We have had to return to the store multiple times to get it fixed and they deny what we paid for. If you are going to pay money for something to help you see please don't go here they are crooks.

resp.text: Hello Amber, thank you for taking the time to rate and review your local Eyemart Express store. We would like to deeply apologize for the experience that you had while visiting your local Eyemart Express store. When concerns arise with our customers we like to make sure that we do our best to resolve them in a practical and efficient manner. We would like to have your concern formalized and sent to a higher level of management so that your concern can be addressed accordingly. To follow up, you are more than welcome to contact our customer care departement at 1-888-372-2763. Thank you, Sahaad - Eyemart Express Customer Care Team.

name: Kathryn B
text: Fast, professional service and great prices!

name: W. Shipman
text: I love both of my new frames!

name: Ms Q
text: Sadly I had lost my glasses and needed replacement pronto. I found them doing a good search and arrived 5 mins before they opened with no appointment. Dr was fantastic and personable. Bummer they are out of network for VSP even with that everything was reasonably priced and my glasses after example took 45 mins! 2 pairs. 45 mins! Wow. Yep still can't find my original pair. Ty eyemart!

name: kristi robbins
text: I really needed prescription sunglasses and decided to take my RX to eyemart in Trussville Saturday afternoon.  There were several customers in the store but I was greeted as soon as I entered the door.  I believed the ads stating 2 pair $74.78.but this is next to impossible.  I ended up spending $119 for 1 pair.  The frames were $9.95 but the progressive added $98.66.  Trying to get the advertised pricing is for people who don't need glasses.  Araseli helped me and did a wonderful job but I really do not think anyone could explain the pricing. Even though the pricing was crazy, I was happy with my final decision.  Araseli told me the glasses would be ready Monday but when I got home around 2 hours later I received the text the glasses were ready.  I really like my new glasses but noticed when I got home there is writing and lines on one lens.  I plan to take the glasses back Monday and see if they can clean this off or replace the lens.

name: Meko Smith
text: I went there for same day glasses but had to wait 3,they are very helpful and courteous  but should not advertise same day glasses because it's not possible everyday obviously

name: John Farrington
text: Great selection,  great selection, fast!!

name: Evelyn Smith
text: Excellent service and fast.

name: Cedrico Huggins
text: Great service

name: GoonBoy EVAN
text: worst place I have ever been to.....some of the rudest people I have ever met....wld not recommend that anyone go there.

resp.text: Hello Evan, thank you for taking the time to rate and review your local Eyemart Express store. We would like to apologize for your experience during your most recent visit. We will make sure to have this concern forwarded to higher management so that it can be addressed accordingly by higher management. You are more than welcome to follow up with us by contact our Customer Care Department at 1-888-372-2763. Thank you, Sahaad - Eyemart Express Customer Care Team.

name: Birmingham tours
text: Good deals

name: Che
text: Fast!!!

name: charlene allen
text: Employees are extremely nice and helpful! Dr. Campbell-awesome, easy to talk to and listened to all my concerns! The young guy that helped me pick out my frames had excellent taste and was fun to shop with! My glasses were ready super fast! Will definately recommend to my friends!

name: Jessica
text: I’ve been coming here for years and it’s always been great. Today’s visit though was one of the best I’ve ever experience! The staff was super friendly, and I’ve never had an exam done in such a timely manner before! Keep being amazing!

name: Carson Blankenship
text: I have been a patient here for years & have had nothing but wonderful and satisfactory experiences. I just ordered contacts over the phone because I live In a new city, and Ms. Terrish went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me. She was funny, professional, & kind. I cannot give this employee or this business enough praise! Thank you so much!

name: Brittnee Serda
text: I brought my daughter in this morning for a eye app. It was her 2nd one and Marcus the guy who checked us in and walked us to the room made sure to make my daughter feel comfortable and calm her nerves. I really appreciate the service. Thank you so much for being friendly and sweet. ❤️ Will definitely go back.

name: FUU CHAN
text:
They checked my eyesight very carefully and examined me. Also, when I chose eyeglasses, I had a lot of choices and it was a good opportunity. It is highly recommended to adjust the glasses here.

You need to make a reservation by phone.

name: alfred keely
text: When we made the appointment for the eye exam, we were told that we didn't have to get our glasses from them. I have used the eye doctor there in the past, and was happy with the quality of the exam. I went there today for my appointment,  and the doctor side was excellent. Then I was escorted to the eyeglass side. When I told them I wasn't getting glasses today, and asked for my PD, they refused to give me that information. Then she said something really brilliant. That that measurement is only for their lab, and it varies from one lab to another. REALLY!  The distance from center to center of my pupils is the same wherever it gets measured. My wife is seriously ill, and a  $500.00 pair of glasses isn't possible. She was rude. I'll never go back.

name: Jaelene Rivera
text: Been there for almost 3 or 4 years and still worth to come here. Fantastic customer service and Friendly staff. I love to come here and I love my glasses so much!

name: Linda Martinez
text: Ashley was the most helpful and kind associate ever.  Quick service with a smile!  Highly recommend

name: Carey Frasier
text: Love this place.... so so helpful. lots of style and smile..

name: Stacy Wilborn
text:
I have purchased regular glasses, prescription sunglasses, safety glasses, and my four year old step son's glasses from Marx Optical. Every time I have come to Marx Optical, I have had a perfect experience! They have always been so helpful in answering all of my questions. Kathy has been there on every visit of mine. She is always so good to us, and completely on top of her game. I've noticed her assisting others, multitasking and always prompt, and with a great attitude. I have had Sabrina assist me, she is so helpful and not only brightened my day, but seemed to do the same with everyone else she encountered. And when I brought my step son to get his glasses, I had the assistant of Lindsey and she was so patient and great with him. He has a more complicated prescription and she showed us more options for frames that won't break as easily (considering he's four and full of energy)

I highly recommend Marx Optical! They're quick and will treat you right!

name: Ryan Day
text: I was in Decatur for a weekend in January for a family funeral, coming from out of town, and I stupidly forgot both my glasses and extra daily contacts.  Marx Optical was kind enough to provide me with two days' worth of trial daily contacts at no charge to help me out.  I would highly recommend.  Very nice people.

name: Ulonda Barker
text: My experience with this business have been a terrible one,  after purchasing lens for my glasses on 9/19/2019. On 8/11/2020 used curbside service for glasses last repaired for only tighting frame and prior service for exact same routine service from date of purchase. I returned on 8/21/2020 to curbside service based on one leg cracked, due to frame was tighten to tight to end up with a cracked len. In discussing issue with Service Tech,  I was told to replace len would cost me $125 and their would be nothing else Marx Optical could do. I consider my service that was rendered is a rip off based on less than a year from 9/19/2019 intial purchase and finding  my len cracked in my glass case as I put glasses onto my face for breakfast and service rendered for glasses tighted on 8/11/2020. Personally doing business with inconsiderate respect for it's customers.  Is very disgraceful.

name: Mark Thomason
text: Dr. B does an amazing job of dialing in my prescription. I have tried several other places over the years (we moved) but now I travel back to Decatur to see Dr. B every year. The glasses I got from other places were a waste of money. I ended up coming back to Marx and had them install new lens in my old frames. I will never trust anyone with my eyesight other than Dr. B again.

name: John Kearse
text: I LOVED MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE GREAT WOMEN AT MARX OPTICAL. FROM THE RECEPTIONISTS, TO MY LOVELY DOCTOR, DOWN TO THE ASSISTANTS AND REPRESENTATIVES HANDLING THE FITTINGS. I FELT LIKE FAMILY, NOT ANOTHER CUSTOMER AND WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE GOING THERE TO GET GREAT STYLISH GLASSES AND TO FEEL LIKE HOME WITH TONS OF SMILES & LOVE AS WELL!!! I ALSO LOVED MY FITTING WITH MS. KRISTINA H. SHE WAS WONDERFUL!!!

name: Tonja Crisler
text: Recently had an appointment and even though they were in the middle of construction I don't have 1 complaint! It was totally the opposite, they were extremely nice and helpful. The staff went over and beyond for me  I give them 5 full stars. 😊

name: Will Wright
text: I have bought glasses from Kathy before, but it is always a pleasure to deal with her at the front desk. I had Sandy wait on me this time and she was very nice,  pleasant and professional to work with. Gail came over and assisted and it was all a pleasure. I’m always appreciative of the service I have got, and this year was no different.

name: Vann Morrow
text: Have always gotten courteous , professional service every time I have been here . Even today with the curbside service for just a frame repair , in the rain, everyone was absolutely great !

name: monwitt
text: Pam and Sabrina did a great job helping me pick out my frames. I felt like family right when they started working with me. I would definitely recommend my friends and family to go see these awesome professionals. Wonderful customer service is greatly appreciated!!!

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Dr. Brock was wonderful! All the people there are super nice and service is quick. Prices are very reasonable. I will be using them from now on.

name: christopher odell
text: Awsome place prices up there but the people did a great and look good to

name: Pamela W Radford
text: The last three times that I have had to get glasses a wonderful young woman named, Sabrina, has helped me and she is a fantastic person!!!!!  Not only was Sabrina so gosh dang funny she was extremely helpful in helping me choose the right glasses for me.  I vote for Sabrina to get a raise 😁.  Now I am truly promoting Sabrina here but make no mistake.....every person at Marx Optical has been a pleasure to deal with.  I have been going to Marx Optical for the past 7/8 years and I have never had a bad experience. The people are truly great!  Thank you, Pamela W Radford

name: April Bendall Woods
text: LaRhonda is the sweetest, nicest and most helpful employee there. She always goes above and beyond to help and she’s very knowledgeable about their services and glasses/contacts. Marx Optical is lucky to have such a great employee.

name: Local 360
text: Wow! Great service! I came in 30 minutes from closing with a broken arm on my VA issued glasses. The staff took them to the back & they were able to repair the glasses and didn't charge me! How great is that for on the spot service! I can see again!

name: Theduis Booth
text:
I had a great experience today in Marx optical, in Decatur. Every one was so nice, and polite.
I must give a special thanks to Ja, she literally took her to help me pick out frames. She never rushed me. Thank you Ja so much for sticking with me.

name: Mackenzie Thrasher
text: This first time glasses wearer is HAPPY! Sabrina and Pam were so helpful and awesome to work with! A love working with a good honest sales team that doesn’t push for the most expensive merchandise! My visit was effortless!

name: Brandon McNutt
text: I visited here for a routine visit. I was helped by one Miss Sabrina who was absolutely fabulous! She took care of me from start to finish and made sure I felt like family the whole time! She was easy to talk to and made me feel comfortable! I would highly recommend this place and I am so thankful for having such a wonderful person like Sabrina that helped me through it all! Not to mention that Dr. Harris was extremely professional and helpful during his evaluation! With the help of Miss Kelly I was able to get an awwsome brand new pair of glasses. I would recommend this place for all your eye Care needs!!

name: Brooke cummings
text: Sabrina was extremely helpful. She was truthful and honest and patient when I tried on every pair and was even nicer when I came to each age because the first pair I bought I didn't love. She's the best! As long as she is there I will always come back.

name: Cyndi Ludwick
text: If you want EXCELLENT customer service, see Sabrina!! She helped me with my glasses today and she is by far the sweetest associate I have EVER met!!! She was honest on what looked good..(and didn’t) on me and was also conscious of my pocketbook!!! I think Marx Optical needs to give her a raise!!!

name: Jo-Amrah Dillingham
text: Lindsey Albright was amazing to work with today. Professional, friendly. No doubt she knew what she was doing. I really appreciated the way she was able to fix my glasses which had been frustrating me for some time. Top quality service. I will return!

name: Faith Rose
text: My experience was amazing. The whole team treated me like family. The really sweet one that helped me her name was Mrs. Sabrina she was so helpful and she really found me a pair of glasses the fit my face very well and that were very nice.😊😊😊😊

name: Rhonda Stoner
text: I cannot say enough fabulous things about this place! The exam staff is efficient and kind. The optical department rocks! All of them! Sabrina helped us today. She is a love! Leidy was in training and she is going to be top-notch as well! It was great to see Miss Linda who has been around for a while and is always a sweetheart. I did not mention everyone by name, but they the staff is wonderful.

name: Ashlea Osborn
text: Kristina H was OUTSTANDING !! She helped us save a whole bunch of money and made our decision better. We was more satisfied with her help then we was when we was looking and we getting help from another lady. She helped us save almost three hundred dollars that we really did not have to spend . We was so stressed about finding some and paying for it but she helped a whole lot. She definitely needs to be recognized !!!!! She explained everything and told us all of our opinions!!

name: Truck Driver
text: 2nd visit in 2 years. I walked in, was given a paper to fill out,.wven though I told them nothing had changed.  Once I finished with completing the paperwork I was taken into a to and again went through the process of putting the info into the computer.  What good is being redundant with this. Also, prior to visit, I was bombarded with text messages on if I planned to make the appointment on time. Place is pathetic!

resp.text:
We are sincerely disappointed your experience with us was not great. Rest assured, your experience and feedback is appreciated in our pursuit of continuously improving the ability to serve.

You are correct, we do currently include up to two reminders prior to visitation, depending on how far in advance you have scheduled. However, this is certainly a feature you can opt-out from as we respect the differing opinions our patients may have with regards to reminders.

Regarding the paperwork and entry into the computer, this is definitely a point at which we are actively looking to streamline, importantly, without sacrificing vital information our Doctors require to provide a high standard of care.

We certainly realize this will not correct your experience, but we genuinely hope you understand our intention is to take your feedback and work harder for all future experiences.

Thank you,
MARX OPTICAL

name: Teiana Walker
text: I had a great experience at Marx Optical from the eye exam to picking out my frames Gail and Joshua were absolutely amazing making sure I looked my best in my glasses. And Kelly was exceptional with the fitting of my glasses. Best place in town to get your eyes checked out. I will also share this on my Facebook because I am a satisfied customer of Marx Optical!!!

name: Vashta Nerada
text: I have never had the pleasure of being helped so efficiently before today’s visit. Terrish was being trained by Sabrina today and they were wonderful, knowledgeable, and so friendly. They made this visit a 5-star event.

name: David Watson
text: Sabrina made my experience at Marx absolutely wonderful.  I was ready to order my glasses on-line because they were much cheaper than the price she originally quoted.  Sabrina told me to hold on a second and let her discuss my reluctance with her superiors.  She came back with a price considerably lower than the online price. I will be requesting Sabrina next year, and hopefully many years to come

name: Ala Bama
text: I visited Marx Optical in Decatur and overheard an employee out front refer to customers as “Love” and she was constantly popping her gum. This drove me crazy listening to it while I waited. I can’t imagine being her coworker and having to listen to the gum popping all day and as a customer, don’t call me “Love.” So unprofessional!!!

name: Tristan Smith
text: Sabrina greeted us with a big ole’ smile right when we walked in. The atmosphere was great and everyone was very welcoming. Got to checkout and it went very smoothly and with Sabrina seeing us off! Great staff!

name: Nathaniel Snow
text: My company sent me to Marx Optical to get my glasses. When I walked I asked the receptionist do my company cover my glasses expense. The other receptionist name Sabrina said what. Like had me in really doubt that my company didn’t do that, but she was only kidding around with me. Then she was sent to help me pick out my glasses. She was really helpful with me to pick out the glasses I would be really satisfied with.  Thanks Sabrina

name: Elfa Arocho
text: We love Sabrina Gibson! She is one of the sweetest most helpful person among your staff! Thanks Marx Optical for a friendly, helpful staff, and competitive prices!

name: Wendy McCulloch
text: I was a walk-in they got me right in for a eye exam and glasses.  I was shocked as to how well the workers worked together and how much they did to have everything ready for the doctor to do the exam. I went to the other side to get a pair of glasses. I had the pleasure of meeting Sabrina she was super nice and very helpful. Sabrina made the experience fun.

name: Janet Wilkinson
text:
10-30-18-Kristina was a very helpful person & she was very easy to work with in giving her expertise knowledge on getting my lens for my glasses. Love working with people who are knowledgeable & pleasant to work. Linda was able to adjust my glasses so they fit. Her knowledge & willingness to work with my older frames was excellent!
Thank you both.

name: Faye Spivey
text:
I usually deal with Marsha when I visit Marx.
She is always so kind and helpful! Her personality is contagious! She is just super!! She knows what I like when it come to frames for my face shape and always picks the ones she knows I will like.
The staff here does a great job!!

name: April Thompson
text: My Husband is a patient of Marx Optical and I accompanied him at his visit. I was so impressed with the staff as well as the warm, inviting and professional setting, I decided to setup one for myself. My appointment was with the kind, humble and calm speaking Dr. Graham. From the moment I entered the office, I never once felt like just a "Patient" The caring environment and effortlessly prompt service made me feel as if I were being taken care of by FAMILY. And oh my goodness the charismatic and professional 3 ladies by the names of Sabrina, Leidy  and (one other sweet lady who said such uplifting and kind words to me whose name I apologetically forgot 😔❤) are 3 of many reason I'd strongly suggest you go visit the Marx Optical family! I promise.. You won't be disappointed. 😀😀😀

name: Kearstin Wright
text: Sabrina Gibson was amazing! She asked what kind I liked and ran with it. When I found the glasses I liked she went the extra mile to order them in a different color so they would be perfect!

name: Rebecca Bray
text: Sabrina is your woman y'all. Amazing job with helping me find what suited my face. The doctor was excellent as well!

name: rolando mcclain
text: By far the best experience I’ve ever had getting an eye exam. Sabrina Gibson did an awesome job assisting us today. We were in and out in a very timely manner. We will definitely be back.

name: Sandy Ray
text: Had a wonderful experience today!  Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of glasses and she was amazing.  Very knowledgeable and willing to assist me in finding the glasses that will best suit my unique needs.  Thank you!

name: Hondahaney
text: way way overpriced....

name: Tara W
text: Sabrina was so helpful and made the process of getting glasses for my mom with her new prescription a breeze!! She really listened to what we needed and has a great personality, which is a huge plus!! Thanks so much!

name: Angela Melson
text: Sabrina was a WONDERFUL help with my glasses I came in with frames and she helped me find new and better ones. TOTALLY SATISFIED with her customer service! Thank you so much!

name: Dylan Reiser
text: Sabrina and Gage were awesome! Helped me pick out frames and lenses in my budget! 10/10 recommend.

name: BreAnna Elliott
text: Sabrina and Dr. B are amazing! I enjoy the whole staff! Fast, friendly, and efficient

name: Cameron Oliver
text: The customer service was amazing. Ms. Sabrina teaching Josh very well. He did a really good job. He has a bright future in the company.

name: Shelby Terry
text: My first time at Marx Optical was awesome thanks to Dr. B, Sabrina, and Sandy! They helped me pick out my glasses no problem and informed me how much my insurance would cover, and told me HONESTLY which glasses looked good and bad and I am super thankful for that lol! I enjoyed the customer service very friendly and compassionate :)

name: Ryan Dunlap
text: I was helped by a lady named Marsha and she was absolutely amazing. We had a rough day involving a trip to the emergency room and once we got to Marx it was like a breath of fresh air to be helped by someone who genuinely cared. She was super patient and never once made us feel like a problem. She was amazing! I would recommend Marx Optical to anyone! And don’t forget to ask for Marsha I promise you won’t regret it!

name: Kathryn Brannon
text: Love Marx Optical!! Everyone was so nice even when my insurance was a huge mess. Love going here to find new glasses! Kristina Hyatt was the best! Love her & my new glasses.

name: Alexis Almazan
text: Sabrina was of excellent help, took her time to explain the whole process, fast and attentive service! Really enjoyed my experience! Everyone was very friendly and helping.

name: Merita Sharp
text: Saturday, 2/22/19, was my first visit to Marx Optical in Decatur.  I did not have an appointment but was immediately met by Kathy who instantly put me at ease and provided outstanding service.  Kathy's knowledge and professionalism will make me a long term customer.

name: Jaime Corcoran
text: Great experience!! Helpful and friendly staff. Sabrina was excellent!! She explained everything in terms we could understand and took her time with us. I would recommend Marx optical, and Sabrina to everyone!!!

name: Teri Wilhelm
text: Today Ms. Kristina helped me out and was amazing.  She made it a very simple process for me. The ladies here are wonderful. I have not ever had a bad experience and have gotten several pair of glasses here over the years.

name: Cindy Brantley
text: I have to give a huge shout out for Marsha!!  She was so very kind, helpful and certainly to much fun!!   She's the best and Marx Optical is truly a better place with her a part of their team!!!!!!

name: Shaquille Moore
text: I really enjoyed my experience there. I scheduled my appointment a week early and the lady who assisted me Sabrina made sure I had all my information in the system ahead of time so I didn’t have to worry when I arrived the following week. Terrish another associate also was very helpful with finding me the perfect pair of glasses. The staff members are all amazing. I’m an observant person and I notice how everything ran smoothly even with them going through a renovation. I would recommend anyone to visit the Decatur location on Beltline road if they’re in need of an eye exam or simply getting your glasses readjusted. My service was swift and I also received my prescription glasses the same day in less than an hour after my exam which was amazing!  I’m looking forward to my next checkup in a year to see my progress and also to visit the friendly staff.

name: Roger Simpson
text: Sabrina took very good care of me. Made sure I got the contacts I needed and took care of updating my glasses. All with a smiling face and a professional attitude!

name: Christy Moore
text: Sabrina was very professional and helpful! Love the pleasant atmosphere of this place! Got some great glasses with the help of Ms. Sabrina! Thank you!

name: Sharon Kreps
text: Cheyenne and Sabrina were AWESOME! This was my first visit to Marx Optical and I will definitely be back. Thanks guys!

text: Great experience today! Dr. Harris always does a great job and explains everything. Sabrina was great in helping me order my contacts! They will be shipped straight to my house! She even helped me get a rebate!

(I'll add that my family doctor wasn't at fault) The only thing that has changed over the years is that they've grown. My wait is a little longer due to this but it's not extreme. For great service, I choose to stay.

name: Jonathan D. Wynn
text:
Have been using them for several years now.  Staff and Dr. Harris are always nice and professional.  I don't have vision insurance, but price on visit is always reasonable.  Wait time is a little long but I never make an appointment either.  I'm always a "walk-in".  The eyeware part is a bit higher on retail prices for contacts so I choose to buy my contacts online.  They are always nice and helpful in providing my written Rx to purchase my contacts elsewhere.  Overall, I would recommend Dr. Harris @ Marx Optical to anyone looking for a good optometrist.......

Update : I have officially quit seeing them after  10+ years.  After sitting waiting for almost 3hours with an eye injury,  I felt as though greater concern should have been given to at least administer a triage type exam to assess the situation,  but none was given.  In much pain,  I decided to leave after nearly 3 hours of waiting, since no concern was given.  I don't know if  my doctor knew that an eye injury was waiting,  but if not, his office staff have been poorly trained to deal with medical necessity Vs.  Standard eye exams.  I have seeked out an ophthalmologist and will begin seeing Dr Cain from now on instead of any optometrist office.

text: I had new glasses but I bumped them and knocked them a little out of alignment.  Asked walmart to adjust them.  They did.  But they also melted my lenses so I couldn't see out of them. I have worn glasses for 20+years, and never has anyone told me i should tell them their business.They reordered these glasses, but when they came, I could see distance but not reading at all.  Shaun Morgan , the manager, told me there was nothing more that he could do.  He argued back and forth with me and his manager.  He was rude and unwilling to help me at all.   So I have worn these glasses for 2 years, but cannot read out of them.

name: Kathy Westbrook
text: I have made 3 visits to his office and will not return.  Dr. Anz might be wonderful but I have decided that he does not work for me. I am an educated person, but I was treated that way. His only direct comment to me was "move your purse."

resp.text: Ms. Westbrook, thank you for taking time to review our practice. I'm extremely disappointed we failed to continue to meet your expectations and regret hearing your interaction with Dr. Anz during last appointment was not to our standard and caused you to feel this way. We truly care about our patients and want to learn from your experience so we as a TEAM, including Dr. Anz, can make improvements. Would you please send me an email with a good contact number so I can call you to discuss your experience in more detail and offer you a personal apology? If you'd like to talk Dr. Anz as well I know he will be disappointed as well to hear this and want to know how he can improve so we can accomplish a few things. My email is josh@medicalartseye.com or you can message me through our Facebook or Google business page. My direct office number is 334-321-9705 but I'm still deployed to EAMC helping with our Covid-19 response so email will be the quickest way for us to connect. We look forward to talking with you & greatly appreciate you helping us improve our delivery of care! -Josh (Manager)

name: Kenzi G
text:
I was referred to this clinic from an urgent care, and an appointment was made for me. I had a severe viral infection in my eyes, and as you can imagine, I was in pain and eager for relief. When I arrived for my scheduled appointment, I was told by the front desk staff that there was no appointment for me on file. I showed them my referral sheet with the doctor's name and appointment time. They continued to refuse me and tell me I had no appointment. The woman checking patients in was very kind and tried her best to help me in a difficult situation. The rest of their office staff was the epitome of unprofessional. Rude, refusing service to a person with an appointment. Yelling, rolling eyes, and snatching papers. My five year old knows better than to act that way. When I called the urgent care and confirmed that I did have an appointment, the Medical Arts Eye Clinic staff tried to cover their mistake by saying they'd been given the wrong name for the appointment, even though my medical records were sent in my name....
No apology offered. No kindness shown to a patient in severe pain. I will never go to this office again. I will find any other eye care provider in the county before I would let these rude people treat me ever again.

resp.text: Thank you for providing feedback on your experience.  I apologize we did not meet your expectations.  If you would be willing to discuss the details further with me I will give you a call today.  -Josh (Manager)

name: Jere Scott Bradshaw
text: Wonderful experience.  Dr. Anz is a skilled doctor with a compassionate manner.  The team was efficient and professional.  I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Bradshaw.  It's our pleasure to provide you with excellent service.  We appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to serve you.

name: Samantha Carrington
text: I went into the Trussville, AL location just to find out what it might cost me to purchase glasses and I was immediately greeted with warm smiles, kind hearts & an extremely knowledgable staff. The store was clean and stocked with so many great choices. What a wonderful experience! My family & I will definitely be purchasing our eye glasses from this store from now on. Thank you for providing me with such excellent customer service.

name: Jennifer “CraftyJenn” Baxter
text:
I don't recommend this place at all. I found some nice frames there that fit me perfectly and was so excited to get my first pair of glasses so I could see better. I got my lens order put in and was told it could take 10-14 days to get them back since they don't make glasses there. I was fine with that. When day 12 came along, I called to check on them to have an idea of when I'd get them. The girl looked in the computer and said that the lens place hadn't gotten them yet, but they should soon and the 14 days wasn't up. I called back on day 14 to check on them and was told they were probably in the box for that day and if not, they'd be there the next day and that they'd call me the next day by noon if they couldn't find them. I called back an hour before closing the next day only to be told that my glasses were most likely in a box that got lost. So I waited for 2 weeks for glasses that went missing. I then I had to search  for an identical frame from another store.
If you don't want to chance your glasses being lost, go somewhere else. I did get a full refund, but the headache with this place wasn't worth it. Oh and they don't communicate with each other so noone knows what anyone else has told you.

name: Rayn Lafollette
text: I had a great experience at America’s best. Everyone at the front desk was polite and quick to assist me. Getting my eye exam the doctor was very informative and helpful as this was my first time needing eye glasses. After I was not rushed when being extremely picky about picking glasses. When I finally picked out glasses It was very helpful to know all of my buying options and all the add ons that were available to me. I would 10/10 recommend America’s best in trussville.

name: Christie Steeley
text: Our experience with this location in Trussville, AL was SPECTACULAR!!!!! FABULOUS customer service!!! The manager, Robin was so kind and helpful! And Madison and Jamie were INCREDIBLE with my daughter. My daughter struggles with much mental illness and exceptions. And these ladies were very patient and kind with her. They put her at ease so easily. I was anxious about the experience with my daughter.... But it turned out to be a pleasant afternoon! I just can't praise them enough!! Very clean store! Very well run! Very organized! Very timely! THANK YOU ladies for such a blessed experience!

name: Jesslin Williams
text: I will never go here again for glasses. The person who was helping me checked my insurance and calculated my frames, I paid a portion out of pocket that day. Fast forward two weeks or so, I receive a bill from America's Best for the exact amount I paid that day. I found it to be shady and I was not happy with the service I received when I went to pick my frames up after being called to do so. The lady acted like I was not suppose to be there then proceeded to give me the wrong frames.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. Let me know if you need assistance getting this resolved.  You can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

A solid ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ rating.

I am very happy with my prescription and my experience here! I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Happy to hear you had such a positive experience with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review, thank you for being our customer!

name: Elena McDaniel
text: I took my son for an exam. I have worn glasses pretty much all my life and this was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced and that is not a compliment. This appointment didn’t even take 15 minutes!  What could the doctor have possibly checked in that short amount of time? My son’s eyes were NOT dilated and to top it off, his Rx is wrong!!! The script written is for farsightedness and my son is nearsighted. I will not be back and will be in contact with the corporate office.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. I’d be happy to have someone from corporate management reach out to you about this. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Douglas Brock
text: Excellent service.  Both pair came out perfect!!!

name: Alex Avram
text: I recently got glasses from the Trussville location and it was an absolutely amazing experience. It was my first time getting glasses so I was a little nervous and not really sure what to do or what to expect. I was greeted by friendly employees and each person who took care of me was super nice. I had fun chatting with everyone there. One of the girls helped me pick out frames and assured me that I looked good. I couldn't wait for my glasses to come in so I could start wearing them. They came back a week later but unfortunately I noticed that one of my lenses was blurry. So I called the store the next day to let them know and the person I talked to was so kind and friendly on the phone and told me to bring them by so they could have a look at them. When I got there, one of the girls told me she accidentally typed in my Rx wrong. The manager came out and talked to me and she also was VERY NICE!! They got my glasses re-ordered and they were back within I think about 6 days! Super fast!! I am so so IMPRESSED with the level of customer service I was shown. I also work in retail and have since 2013. So I've seen all kinds of craziness! Haha! But these people are a class act. They treated me with respect, kindness and put a smile on my face despite the accident. I wasn't worried about it. I was just glad they got it corrected and I couldn't be happier. I HIGHLY recommend this location if you need glasses! I am going to tell all my friends and family about them! They definitely have my loyalty!
