text: The Staff at Visual Eyes took great care of me! From the moment I scheduled the appointment all the way through my eye exam, glasses fitting and through the checkout process. Their office is very comfortable, the technology used in the exam is advanced and their service is second to none. You should check them out for all your eye care needs.

name: Kevin Worrell
text: Great overall experience! Very friendly, knowledgeable staff! Can’t say enough good things about my visit. Highly recommend to everyone.

resp.text: Kevin, thanks so much for the kind words. It was a pleasure taking care of you.

name: Joe Booker
text: Great staff.  Very good to work with.   They explained all parts of the process and specifics about the health of my eyes and eyesight.  Very pleased.

name: NaTa'sha Black
text: The VisualEyes family were so professional, polite, and helpful to my daughter and I. Best experience I've had in a while. Very thorough. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for an eye care office, Dr. Green and his staff will take care great care of you.

name: Vikki Chavis
text: Dr. Green is Awesome! So thorough and caring of his patients. He took the time to make sure I understood the options in depth I have with myopia control for my son. I highly recommend! Environment is warm and friendly with GREAT customer service!!

name: James Bates
text: Had a comprehensive eye-exam done at VisualEyes recently. The staff was very helpful with the exam and navigating their extensive glasses selection! They have a huge selection from a lot of designers and brands. Dr. Green was very helpful in the exam and helped me easily understand what he was doing and why he was doing it. It was nice to have a doctor actually explain things to me about my eye health and vision. I will be recommending VisualEyes and Dr. Green from now on. Excited about my new glasses as well!

name: Lisa F Katz
text: They use high technology equipment to evaluate your vision.  I think it makes your exam more efficient and accurate.  The only thing I found that wasn’t so great for me was their prices were high on frames.  They have very friendly and helpful staff there.

name: Vicki Ladnier
text: Everyone at VisualEyes made me feel welcome and well-cared for! Always ready to answer my questions and never too busy to take time for me. I would highly recommend VisualEyes to all my friends.

name: Nicole Clements
text: The staff here is amazing- from check-in to check-out!! I don't remember her name but the lady who helped me pick out my frames was the best- not only did she help me pick out frames that she thought would look good on me, but she was MORE than patient with me while I sat there taking forever to make a decision. I can't say enough good things about this place, highly recommend!!!

name: Robin Little
text: I went to see Dr. Green today at Visual Eyes.  I was met with a smile and friendly service.  The doctor was very  thorough and explained everything to me.   They carry a huge selection of glasses and their office is beautiful.  If you are looking for an eye doctor.  I would definitely recommend Visual Eyes.

name: Elisha-Hope Weaver
text: Everyone is friendly, helpful and professional.  Your entire process is explained and they give you an opportunity to ask as many questions you need for complete understanding.  Only cons are 1) the location may a bit remote for some 2) the cost of buying glasses in-house is rather steep; more affordable options are needed.

name: Marsha Richardson
text: State of the art equipment and procedures available. Very friendly staff. Attentive Doctor.

name: Erik Montz
text: The folks at VisualEyes were great. Everyone that was part of my visit was very nice and helpful. From the front desk to Dr. Green to the ladies that helped me pick out my glasses. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Service @ T-Town H-D
text: The stafff really went above and beyond for me. I would recommend them above all others hands down. I have lived all over the country and have been in glasses for 34 years. This is the best eye Doctor I have ever been too!

name: Cady Weldon
text: The office staff are all so incredibly nice and they always remember me by name. Both they and the doctor give so much personalized attention and spend as much time with me as I need. The office is in a great location, extremely clean, and upscale, and all of their equipment is state-of-the-art. They have a great selection of frames already, but I have a huge head and have a hard time finding frames that fit comfortably and look good, so they were more than happy to order a bunch of additional demos for me to try, which was such a great convenience! I have have already referred all of my friends and coworkers because I really do just believe this place is the best!

name: Gina Creech
text:
My husband and I traveled from Charleston, SC to see Dr Green.  We heard of his reputation as a very thorough and knowledgeable doctor. We were not disappointed. We had the most thorough exam we have ever had. After having cancer of my lower eyelid and almost loosing my eye, I take my eye care very seriously. Also, I have experienced flashing lights in my peripheral vision.  Dr Green's office uses cutting edge equipment.  Therefore, he was able to use a CT scan of my eye to show and explain in great detail what happened, when I had these episodes.
The staff at VisualEyes are efficient and friendly. The atmosphere in the office is one of caring. The office is comfortable, clean, and beautiful. The selection of eyeware is the best I have ever seen.  There are so many beautiful frames you will be challenged to just pick one frame.  Great care is given by the staff to assist you in finding the perfect pair of glasses. There knowledge of the perfect shape and color for your individual face is unprecedented.

name: Erika Wells
text: The service was exceptional!!

name: Tasha
text: Not only was the staff courteous and showed great hospitality - you feel at home! I was nervous b/c I was having issues due to my astigmatism but i felt very confident leaving the office. Dr. Green was very thorough about imaging, astigmatism, etc. I would definitely recommend!

name: GG
text:
Friendly atmosphere & thorough examination.  I will definitely recommend to family & friends!!
Thank you for taking care of us!!!

name: Andrew Short
text: I didn't always like going to the eye doctor and going through the exams, but Dr. Green and his staff make the experience so easy!  The equipment they incorporate into the process help streamline everything.  thankful for VisualEyes!

name: Morgan Rushing
text: Everyone was very friendly and professional! My appointment was very thorough and I spent almost no time waiting. I definitely recommend using them!

name: Frank Barker
text: Very helpful, very kind, very informative & very patient.

name: Jason Moore
text: Great staff and first class facility.

name: Wanda Goudeau
text: Professional  and friendly staff. Most thorough eye exam I’ve ever had. Dr Green is the best!

name: Jimmy K
text: This is by far the best eye center ever! Staff are amazing and the doctor is very professional and informative! I recommend this place to everyone I talk too!

name: Holly Kantin
text: Nicest staff ever, very conscientious and helpful. Has a wonderful selection of glasses. Dr. Green is excellent and very patient (I ask a lot of question).

name: R M
text: Too many spam calls from them.  I get fake calls from them saying honey just a reminder of you appointment.  Liked going there but I am sick of all the spam calls.

resp.text: Robin, I am very sorry that you are unhappy with the notification system that our office utilizes.  Our office uses this system to remind patients of their appointments, when glasses or contact lenses are ready for pickup, and when it is time for their exam.  I have temporarily stopped all notifications and reminders for you; please contact our office and so that we can update your communication preferences.

name: Yuri Linetsky
text: Beautiful office with very modern equipment. The O.D. and other staff were courteous and professional. Overall, a great experience.

name: Mishon Flanigan
text: Truly a Great Experience! Super Sweet Staff and Dr. Green! I will be telling my coworkers about Visual Eyes!

name: Tom Prelich
text: Dr Green and entire staff are so professional and pleasant. They make us feel like family.

name: Nancy Reed
text: Amazing facility and welcoming staff. Service and care was impeccable. Definitely recommend.

name: Kim Sanders
text: Everyone there is very professional, personable, and friendly!  It is a warm and welcoming atmosphere and I enjoy every visit!

name: Lacie Nolin
text: I had an awesome experience at Visual Eyes. Dr. Green and staff are amazing to work with and I highly recommend everyone go see them for your annual eye exam.

name: Christine Blakley
text: Professional, warm and caring service! My entire family has made the switch to Dr. Greene's office and we couldn't be happier.

name: Autumn Kennedy
text: I love the Christian music playing and the staff are so sweet & helpful!! My favorite place for eye glasses!

name: Abby Payson
text: The best of the best!

name: kristy pruet
text: Love everything about Visual Eyes!  The office, the staff, the care can't be beat!

name: Kerry Shipp
text: Great people and very thorough exam!! Very friendly and very attentive to my needs!

name: Nancy Reed
text: Phenomenal customer service. Great location & beautiful facility.

name: Jimmy Hart
text: The people at VisualEyes are wonderful, helpful and very good at what they do.

name: Anne Marie Goodman
text: Great Doctor. Great staff. Great experience.

name: Shelba Stroud
text: We love to come to VisualEyes, we’re treated like family every time!

name: Kelli Smith
text: Great experience very welcoming and relaxing atmosphere!

name: Scott Galbraith
text: Great place with an awesome staff👍🏼

name: Luann Robinson
text: Very helpful, patient and nice.

name: Luci Duco
text: Love Dr. Green and the staff!

name: Lon Mecham
text: Beautiful office!

name: Emily Layton Sasser
text: My husband and I were able to get an appointment conducive with our work schedules and were seen promptly. The staff was helpful and Dr. Barton was thorough. We are both happy with our contacts and look forward to finding some glasses!

name: Marleena Giacobone
text: Dr. Barton is a very kind and very thorough. He was clear and concise on all aspects of my care. He is also wonderful with children. My son thought he was great and was very comfortable with him. He and his staff were prompt and kind. I would definitely recommend their practice to everyone. They are the best in the area!!

name: Kristy White
text: I love that Dr. Barton and his staff are great with the whole family, and that I can get big city technology and expertise without leaving town or sacrificing local, friendly, and personal customer service. The best eye team in South Alabama.

name: Rex Brannon
text: VERY PROFESSIONAL GOOD PEOPLE WELL RUN

name: kim harrison
text: They were awesome. Best ppl to deal with. Very caring and kind. You feel like you are with friends.

name: Angie Boutwell
text: Dr James Barton and his staff are amazing!

name: Boomer Matthews
text: EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE. DR BARTON AND HIS STAFF WAS VERY HELPFUL, FRIENDLY AND EXPERIENCED

name: April Woods
text: Best eye doctor around and nicest people to speak with

name: Andrea M
text: Dr. V and staff were amazing! 😊 Top notch service, his knowledge of the eye was impressive and deep. Very nice selection of glasses, had them in two hours, and his humor was dry, refreshing and contagious. Wonderful experience. And the prices are great too!!

name: Cynthia Machen
text: After a battle with the lawn mower, my glasses needed some serious help! I called late the afternoon of the mishap, was seen the next morning, and had a new pair of glasses by 3:00 PM. Very pleasant and knowledgeable staff!  They were even able to put my old ones back together for me to wear until the new ones were ready.  Absolutely great to deal with!

name: Julie Miller
text: We were visiting family in the area and our 4- year old fell and needed his glasses adjusted in a bad way! They were able to see him on a Saturday and get him all fixed up. The help was so kind and wonderful with him. I couldn’t be more thankful for them being able to help him be able to wear his glasses for the rest of our trip. I was so concerned he would be without them until we made it back home. This place is fantastic!

name: Ethan Martin
text: I've been to different eye doctors since I was 8yrs old I am 30yrs now an this was the best place I've ever been, by far. Thank you very much guys. Your prices an customer service are amazing.

name: Heather Woodard
text: Started off pretty good. Not many options in glasses for people with bigger faces. But finally found some that looked decent. When I came to pick up my prescription the lenses seemed off. I took them home and tried them for a week. Still had problems. Went back and saw Jamal, he made some adjustments. So now I'm bringing the glasses back and they are going to make new lenses for me. The star rating might improve after the issue is fixed! Also they are a very busy place need to hire more help. Running Billy and Jamal to death.

name: Catayh Luna
text: Dr. Valentini, Jamal, Billy...THANK YOU!!! Our time with you was PERFECT!!! The BEST customer service EVER!!! GREAT eye exams, GREAT selection and prices! Well worth the hour drive we made to get to you. We will never go anywhere else. Everyone there went above and beyond to help us, all the while being so friendly and kind. THANK YOU!!!

name: Azaela Denneille
text: The people there were super helpful and made the process easy and understandable! The doctors were friendly and the tech assistant was very reliable. They also help clean glasses free of charge!

name: John Gerowski
text: I returned 2 Warby Parker sets of eyeglasses right at 500.00. And 1 set of Wal-Mart Eyewear at over 500.00. I decided to give this organization a try. They spared no details. From frame selection to lens selection and overall fit. Ill be picking up my Eyewear on Wednesday at which time I will order another set of eyeglasses. This place is phenomenal  . I'll keep coming back.

name: YAHUAH'S CHOSEN
text: This place was customer service at it's finest from the first phone call untill I waked out of the door.  Leonardo Jamal answered my original inquiry, set our appointment and greeted us by name when we walked in. Our experience with Dr. Valentini was extremely pleasing. He was easy going and made us laugh a lot! Even better, his experience is portrayed in his performance and we are so happy we chose this practice to serve our family! Thanks!

name: Landon Bragg
text: Professional and courteous staff, very fast service, and excellent prices. Dr. Valentini is straight-forward and thorough. I highly recommend giving this place a try especially if you've been to a chain for eye wear. You won't regret it!

name: Tonya Baker
text: I've always hated going to the eye doctor for anything until I came here i loved the staff and doctor changed my thought about eye doctors so with pride I give them a 5❣

name: Allen Tinker
text: Great and friendly staff. The eye Doctor was very thorough and the office is very clean and the turn around time for getting my glasses was awesome.

name: Kim Liner
text: The manager was so polite,very sweet and patient with my daughter like he was her own! He made sure the fit her face perfect. Better than anywhere I’ve been!

name: Lacey Payne
text:
This place is truly amazing and the people are phenomenal!
I was with my (pregnant) sister today who was having some severe agitation in her eye, along with multiple ruptured blood vessels. We were both a little nervous and unsure if she should see a doctor about her eye or if it was something to heal on its own. Thanks to some frightening google results, we decided to call a doctor. I remembered my pastor mentioning this optometrist and giving great reviews, so we called ahead and they got her in immediately!
The doctor was so so nice and had a great personality. I could not have asked for better treatment for my sister during such a stressful time!
A huge thank you to the staff for being so gracious and kind!

name: Robert Boman
text: Awesome experience! My eye exam was quick and thorough. I got my glasses the same day and the guys up front are extremely kind.

name: Darrell pontero
text: These people are super nice the place is spotlessly clean, The prices are great would not ever go anywhere but there.

name: Freddy. Thornburg
text: Best place I have been to get glasses!Knowledge,friendly, very professional. Large selection of frames. Had appointment at 12:30 ,picked up glasses later that day 5:15 Only place I will go to get glasses!

name: Ricky Woodham
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Shelby Cain
text: First time at a eye doctor, wonderful experience! Staff was friendly, helpful, and helped me understand what was going on with my vision/eyes. Highly recommend!!! Will be back!:)

name: Darlene Ezzell
text: Very friendly staff! The day I went there was no wait. Took me right in to be evaluated. Seemed very well up to date on everything and technology. Being able to get my glasses in the same day was a great big plus!! Very Pleased! Definitely Recommend!!

name: Gary Isenhour
text: I really like Dr. Valentini, he is an Army vet and is straight forward with his work. Their service and work is very fast. I will continue to use them. Hooah!!!!

name: heather hulsey
text: By far THE BEST eye doctor I've ever been to! The staff were so welcoming and knowledgeable about their products. It was so refreshing to walk in and see such a large array of options to choose from! The doctor himself was phenomenal! He was so professional yet he would walk you through every step of the process. I think he's a teacher at heart. 😉 The whole experience was wonderful and fun too. Not only can I see now lol but I love my frames! The prices are customer service are unheard of. The location is great too! My brother and sister in law gave me the recommendation and boy am I glad they did! GO SEE THESE GUYS!! You will NOT regret it!!

name: XxAngelPophighXX
text: I have gone to the same eye physician half my life and he retired.  So I took a chance on this place and oh my!!!!!  From Billy, to Jamal to Dr. V all have incredible customer service skills which means a lot.  They are welcoming and very professional.  They have definitely created a Raving Fan!!!!!!

name: Michele Tyndall
text: I was visiting from out of town on a Saturday and had an eye problem that may have required medical attention. Dr. Valentini quickly made it easy and affordable for me to be seen at the last minute, gave me a through exam and put me at ease. He was professional, friendly and ensured I understood my vision problem and terms. This is a family-owned business and if I resided there, I would switch to this optometry clinic for all my vision needs.

name: Brett Eastwood
text: Great service , friendly staff in and out didn't take all day like some of the others in town !!

name: Toya Baker
text: The staff at this facility went above & provided top notch care to my mother! I scheduled an appt from 2k miles away & my mother was able to be seen immediately & obtain her glasses in record time. She is now seeing without strain & she is thankful for such great care of her fragile eyes. Thank you Billy & Jamal!!! This couldn't have been done without you! Forever grateful ❤.

name: Stephen Hamilton
text: Super pleased with the help I had from Dr. Valentini and his staff! This is one of the best places I've been to in the region, and I've been to a lot. For the balance of style, selection, and value - You can't find a better place to have an eye exam with attention to detail and to find the right products that make sense. Awesome experience!

name: Ken Medders
text: Good experience, staff very helpful and friendly, Dr himself done all  eye testing, very impressed will tell friends and family!

name: paul watkins
text: Great place. Doctor has his way of doing things. He has a weird kind of humor. The glasses were fast and not any higher than anywhere else. They had my glasses done in less than an hour.

name: Cassie.Smith82 Smith
text: Staff was so friendly. I love that I got my glasses the same day and at a better price. I would highly recommend.

name: Ayanna Williams
text: I stopped at this location while passing thru the area and seeing it for the first time. My son and I were both able to be seen as walk ins. We were taken back right away and the Dr as well as the receptionist was Absolutely Amazing! I will come to this place from now on to receive my eye care! Thanx Guys for making this years eye exam an exceptional experience!

name: Hillery Dowdy
text: Highly recommend!! Great service and helpful staff. Good selection of frames and same day service

name: Bethany Nowland
text: thanks to my Mother in law for telling us about her great experiance we are all very please the whole fam now comes lol we tell everyone! !! Great customer service. gets you in for appt fast an you dont have to wait long once there either, longest part for me was picking out a pair of glasses they have such a great selection you want them all! We will definitely keep going back !!!

resp.text: Thank you, Bethany Nowland And we always help you...

name: Kelley Bell
text: Awesome service! I lost my glasses and they got me in same day and made my glasses on sight.  Highly recommend them.

name: Wire Runner (wirerunner)
text: Awesome service. I came in and was able to get seen that day. Good quality glasses quickly.

name: Maurice Valentini
text:
Dear Dylan Hulsey,
I am sorry you feel the way you do regarding Alabama Family Optometry 1 Hour Optical. I am a little perplexed at your negative review, regarding our high prices, rude doctor, and limited selection.
I have searched our data base and don't see you as a previous patient, or someone having ordered product from us in the past.
I have reviewed previous posts from you regarding many other business', and it seems you have a long history of leaving negative reviews.
All I ask from you is you actually come  in to our clinic and experience it in real life for yourself.
We have over 1000 frames on display and many different brands, and our prices are actually lower than competing national chains. At AFO1H we have honest, transparent pricing on 1 and 2 pair eyeglass packages. The pricing is fair and easy to understand. No up-selling or pressure to buy like at the national optical retailers.

As for the doctor being rude, please give me the pleasure of actually meeting you in person, before forming your opinions.

Regards,
Dr. V.
Owner/President AFO1H

name: Netherland Holiday
text:
The staff, the atmosphere,
and the professional approach to eye care is awesome!! I recommend if you are looking for more reviews go to Facebook and read all the great experiences other customers like me have written.

name: Mekia McCormick
text: Best around Hands down!!

name: S. Scroggins
text: Outstanding experience from service to product selection.

name: Jerry Kemp
text: All good and fast..

name: Jazmine A
text: Amazing and timely service!

resp.text: Thank you, Jazmine Avila.

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Devon is one of the most knowledgeable optical managers I've dealt with at Target, she's great at saving me the embarrassment of picking the wrong frames and takes just enough time to make sure I'm walking out the door happy. As long as you have Devon, I will be a loyal customer!

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Drew! You can always depend on us for excellent service. We appreciate your feedback and shout out to Devon. See you next time!

name: Marcy Gerhart
text: Several bad aspects of visit   1-When I arrived I was immediately told that I did not bring anyone with me  to drive so I could not have my eyes dilated. I was NOT told to bring anyone when making the appointment. Also in all my years I have had my eyes dilated and given sunglasses to wear WHILE DRIVING! I heard another woman being told the same thing. Why don't they want to dialate eyes???? Secondly, my distance vision is no better than before my visit. Finally, Target Optical is a franchise, not part of the Target entity, so getting satisfaction is not possible through Target.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Marcy. We're disappointed to hear we did not meet your expectations. We'd like to help you find the right frames. Please reach out to us at bit.ly/TO_Support. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

name: Eric Belcher
text: Thy are WONDERFUL! Due to insurance change, I couldn't use my regular eye dr so I gave them a shot. Dr Powell was awesome and Devin is hands down the best "front of office" person I  have had the pleasure of dealing with. She helped me choose the right frames for me and was patient while I was indecisive.

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Eric! We're glad to hear Dr. Powell and Devin took care of you. If you need any more help, you know where to find us.

name: Katie Jean Wagner
text: They are so awesome! Super clean and efficient.. They have the best selection of frames!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Katie! We strive to provide our guests with excellent service and the best selection of glasses. We're glad to hear you had a great experience! See you next time.

name: Janice Riviere
text: I had a great experience with Target Optical at the Grove (exit 10). Loved Dr. Powell and the ladies helping me choose glasses. They took my VSP insurance and I got a great deal!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Janice! Our entire team is dedicated to providing the best customer service. We love to hear about the great connections they make with our guests.

name: Patrick Galloway
text: Totally unplanned visit to check out their selection of sunglasses that can have a prescription and found a pair of ray bans that fit perfect.  Price was great.  Service from shop staff was very kind and friendly at the time of sale and in a week when the glasses came in from Ray Ban.  Much faster than anticipated on delivery time.   Already had prescription from a recent eye doctor visit that I have used for years.   Will certainly look to order frames and lenses from target optical again!

name: Kristen Ray
text: Devin was absolutely AMAZING! I did not have an appointment & I brought my 1y/o with me. She was extremely patient with us & super friendly. I went through about 15 frames(she never complained & explained safety COVID steps to take when trying on). I was slowly getting frustrated & my baby was getting restless. I explained what I wanted & she sat me down & popped up with 2 frames. I FELL IN LOVE INSTANTLY!!!!!! When I went to pick them up she was more than willingly to work with my glasses until they fit me perfectly. She made suggestions on alternate cleaning cloths...I just— I loved the experience. Keep it up Devin! We need bomb people like you 💖💖

name: declan d
text: Service is fine only if you go in person. There is no way of contacting them by phone as THEY WILL NOT ANSWER. This is a problem if you have a job and can't wait around all day for them to return your call. This also makes it impossible for you to make an appointment. Very frustrating.

name: Laura Watson
text: Fast, fun, and friendly service!

name: Richard McDonough
text: Elaina was very knowledgeable on the products that are sold at this store. If she isn't already, She should be considered an extremely valuable asset for your company. She was very courteous, and patient (that says a lot considering my 5 year old running laps around the store and touching nearly every pair of glasses that she would later have to clean). I would certainly come back to this location and buy from her and Sunglass Hut again.

name: James Hogue
text: Great customer service! Very knowledgeable and helpful. Elaina is absolutely amazing.

name: Joshua Jay
text: Had a pleasant experience from beginning to end. Bought more than I intended and left extremely happy. Excellent service and courtesy from salesperson.

name: Brian Grantham
text: Good selection and a very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Kevin B Price
text: The ladies were extremely helpful and found exactly what I needed!  They had a nose piece for my Oakleys in stock and she was willing to find it - Unlike the other store (which is the brand of my sunglasses!)

name: Mark Toussaint
text: Very pleased with the Service I received today at this location. Elaina was very helpful and professional. She is a great asset to this company. Helped make my buying decision easy and yall are lucky to have her and the other lady that was working alongside her. Give them a raise! Also thanks for shipping the Costas to the house!

name: Hugo Fernando Ramirez
text: The only reason why I’m sharing my experience was because Shane was very helpful and carried the brand name with him highly, with so many other bad experiences my wife and I have had at other businesses here in foley and gulf shores, this purchase was a refreshing change, you can tell Shane really enjoys helping others leave this sunglass hut completely satisfied and feeling well taken care of. This young man is a great asset to this store and the company as a whole! Two thumbs up.

name: Matt Fenton
text: Bought a pair of Maui Jim’s for my wife, the Lady told me I could return them with in 30 days.  I gave them to her a few days later and she didn’t like them. Went to return them and they said they had a small scratch (witch I think was there but I never looked my fault) and couldn’t resell them,so I couldn’t return them.  I told them, so i never really know if I’m buying used glasses because if someone bought a pair and wore them for 29 days and returned them, then they would resell them?  She said yes. So watch out because you don’t know if your buying used glasses or out the box and I’m pretty sure the tiny scratch that was on my wife’s was not from us but was already on it because we got to notice the frams were stretched

name: Douglas Allen
text: Great discount on some Ray Bans

name: Tammy Nance
text:
This is the one on the inside sector of the mall.
The other one is located on the outer north west area.
Great well informed staff

name: LaQuinta Megginson
text: This is my 1 experience of having fun at a doctors appointment. Everyone from the moment I entered the office to my point of picking up my glasses (24 minutes mind you) provided  outstanding customer service. The attention they gave to me and the other customers/patients was wonderful. I’ll definitely return and also tell family and friends about my experience! Please keep up the great work. It is so pleasing to experience people who care about their patient’s and customer’s experience!

name: oo
text: General Manager Claudette is very resourceful knowledgeable helpful and caring. I rated 5 stars because my experience at this location always exceeds my expectations. The only place I would choose to go to for my eye care needs. Its especially great that you will receive your new glasses within an hour. Excellent customer service so I will not go anywhere else but here. And they have beautiful frames to fit your sense of style and warranty so if something happens within a year of purchase you can get them replaced which is a huge help for me.

name: Leslie Cremer
text:
Love this place! Everyone is always so nice and helpful.  It's also affordable.
Was helped in a pinch with my glasses. I'm very appreciative of the care they give their customers.

name: SmallFry Complex
text: Love Eyemart Express .. Placed an order right before closing and picked them up the next day. Eyemart handy dandy workers Khamil & Claudette helped me and my fiance pick outstanding glasses. Everyone has complimented us on them. Thanks again for y'all help. Will be returning soon. We recommend to everyone. Affordable. 🥴🤓

text: Loved my experience at this place. Ms. Warvette helped me pick out new glasses and I just loved her beautiful comforting spirit. Ms. Claudette was also so very nice and funny! I really appreciate these two ladies superb customer service! I Highly recommend this location!

name: Gary A. Swatzell
text:
Comfortable. Not a word used frequently to describe an eye glass store. But comfortable is how I felt while entering Eyemart Express #184 on Cahaba Park Circle. All of the staff were kind, funny and accommodating; especially, Kirk! A brilliant lens technician that knows everything about progressive lenses. For example: I’ve never been able to read books with progressives. The peak progression is so for down making it impossible to fix ones eyes continuously. Kirk suggested a “short progressive” that allows one to focus on the peak 4mm sooner with a much larger window. After purchasing, the change is incredible.

But the big story is: I took Kirk a pair of rimless glasses that I had stepped on back in 2005. They were my favorites and I was nostalgic for them. Kirk didn’t hesitate, he immediately started the logistical process, built the glasses, and a couple of days later: I was looking through short progressive rimless glasses exactly like the ones I stepped on.

But the bigger story is: I’m used to paying around $700 for everything. I was out of the store for less than $275.

I’m a retired engineer and I highly recommend Eyemart Express.

They have a huge selection including designer brands. We were treated so good. I wish I had gotten the lady’s name who helped us. She sat at the very front table/computer. She was very professional and helpful. She made us feel comfortable and at home. We got both pair of glasses made in less than an hour! This is an awesome service since in the town where we live it takes over a week to get glasses made. We couldn’t wait that long. She had a game in 2 days. Besides who wants to wait that long when you need new glasses now? We will definitely shop there again and I will recommend them to everyone I know who needs glasses. text: I moved from Dothan, Al. I had to find a new Optometrist and a glasses store that provided in house manufacture of the prescription.  This is it!!  Although the wonderful Doctor of Optometry, Dr. Wright and Eyemart Express are connected through a door, they disavow any real business connection with each other; however, if there is a problem with the prescription, I'm sure the two entities would collaborate and arrive at a meaningful conclusion to the benefit of the patient.  I went here and had the most thorough, high tech analysis of my optical needs form Dr. Wright.  She is friendly, professional and knowledgeable. Then I took my prescription through the joining door and gave it to Matthew in Eyemart Express.  He was great...knowledgeable and professionally measured my eye distance, got my insurance payouts, suggested the type of 'glass' and tint I could have and their advantages.  Most glasses can be done inhouse and ready that day, but mine needed a week.   I am very happy I lucked out and found this place online.

My dad was visiting for the holidays and needed to update his eyeglasses.  I found Eyemart Express online, made an appointment to see the Dr. and two hours later he had two pair of new glasses.  The customer service, attention to detail and price was great. I highly recommend Eyemart Express.  Ask for Hunter.

The story continues.....  An hour after leaving Eyemart Express, my dad fell and broke his brand new glasses.  Needless to say, we were back in the store and the warranty completely replaced his frames and lens at no charge.  Plus it was done within 20 minutes.

I was so pleased with the service that I decided to buy new glasses for myself and I had a great experience as well.  I had two new pair of glasses in less than an hour.

I highly recommend Eyemart Express on Hwy 280.

name: HeyImKelly AJ
text:
GREAT experience at Eyemart Express - glasses ready in 72 minutes!!

My 10-year-old had her first pair of prescription glasses exactly one week before she lost them at school. The original glasses were from a different eye clinic and we had waited nearly two weeks for them after getting the Rx and choosing frames.

I didn’t want her to have to go another two weeks without clear vision, so I did a web search for “same day glasses”. Eyemart Express popped up in the results, with a very convenient location right on our route between home and school.

I had the Rx faxed to Eyemart Express and we stopped by after school. There was a nice variety of youth frames and my daughter quickly found exactly what she wanted with the assistance of the friendly, knowledgeable associate. I decided to buy two pairs so we would have a backup - just in case. Once the frames were selected, it took a mere 72 minutes for the in-house lab to make the glasses.

Eyemart Express was able to replace my daughter’s glasses in less than two hours from start to finish, including choosing the frames, making the glasses,  and carefully adjusting them for a comfortable, secure fit.

Total cost for two pairs of youth glasses with single vision, impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses, scratch resistant coating and clear UV protection was lass than $185.00.

I’m very pleased with our experience at Eyemart Express and I definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Anne Wynn

On the frames side, the prices are SO much more reasonable than other places. Justin (the GM) and Hunter are perfectly helpful and very personable. The only snafu was one of their machines was down so my glasses weren't ready until the next day, but I believe that was a rare occurrence. This is my new vision place! Definitely recommend!

I got my glasses in 36 minutes and by the end of the day I could see much more clearly. I will definitely be back. The glasses are SUPER affordable, huge selection of them and the staff was amazing.

We will make sure to have your concern addressed with higher management, and do our best to rectify this concern. Thank you - Eyemart Express Customer Care Team.

name: Toni LaVecchia
text: All the people there are great! And so are the prices!

resp.text: Hi Toni! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future! Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

name: Courtney Winbush

name: Barbara Brady

name: Nancy Addison

name: Myrna Pittman

name: Cartez Watts
text: Very good

name: Ricky Dick
text: Best ever!

name: Kayla Woods

text: Fantastic

name: Lawrence Lewis
text: Love the lady  that works here she's always helpful

name: Jacob Whitfield
text: Sold me glasses that had a scratch on them!

name: Telimea Sanders
text: My daughter started off going to the Bel Air Mall location the staff was wonderful. We changed locations due to us moving and for convenience.  The worst decision I ever made. The Schillinger Rd. Semmes location.  The Doctor is Awesome and the front desk staff is horrible unprofessional.  I would call in to make appointments and would be left on hold entirely too long .I would try calling back and speak with someone and the girl would have a attitude.  I left word to speak to a clinical manager never received a call back.. I called for weeks about my daughter's retainer and I have yet to get a response or the retainer that was paid for in advance..every time I call im left on hold. They really need to change office staff or send them back through customer service training and discuss professionalism with them.

name: Thomas Gardner
text: My wife and I had our annual eye exam today and Sarah was just wonderful. And as always Dr. Perry was a pleasure to have as an eye doctor been going to her for years will not go see anyone else!!! Thank you Sarah and Dr. Perry for the great office visit today.

name: Teresa Henderson
text: The staff made me feel real welcome and most importantly, comfortable with my visit. I would recommend Mobile Bay to any of my friends and family (and I already have)!

name: Trenton Hughes
text: I've been trying to get an appointment to install a tooth on my implant for two weeks now. Every time I call to schedule they tell me they will call me back and i have yet to hear from someone.  No one seems to know the proper steps or protocol to schedule me an appointment. Staff needs better knowledge of what's going on. I've been a patient with Mobile Bay Dental for over 15 years. I'm left with no choice but to find another Dentist office. Smh!!!!

name: Brenda Love
text: They are awesome.Always have a great experience when I come here. Christy is the best.

name: Marie Pocase
text: The hygenist Kristy is awesome. She didn't lower me to the floor but let me sit at a comfortable setting. She is very caring & attentive to my needs. I highly recommend her.

name: Jessica M.
text: My family has been coming to this location for 6 years and it has always been a wonderful experience! The staff are very friendly and always willing to make the client feels comfortable and cared for. Our hygienist, Kristy, is absolutely AMAZING. She is very thorough, knowledgeable, and precise.

name: India Hope
text: This was my first visit and Kristy took care of me. Very fast and very attentive. Made me feel more than comfortable just with her warm smile!

name: Bobby Carter
text:
Kristy she was great it was the best dentist visit ever!!
So professional and polite experience.  I will be back for more visits!!!!

name: JANICE KIDD
text: Hey I had a great 👍visit with the dentist and hygienist Kristy she is a wonderful and pleasant person to have a a hygienist Thank you so much.

name: Tanya Powell
text: What’s the purpose in having an appointment?? They send out a message saying be here on time and no later but yet we’ve been here for 45 minutes and people that came in after us have already been seen and left. I’ve never in my life been looked at as our time means nothing. Get with the program!! STOP over scheduling if you can’t see patients on time.

name: PJ Willis-Jackson
text: The best dental experience ever ! My hygienist Kristy is awesome! No long wait time, cater my every need and concerns.Friendly staff and calm atmosphere. Top notch Dentist who explain procedures thoroughly

name: Tiffany F
text: I give my overall experience 5 stars from the ladies at the front desk to the ladies in the back but, Christy the hygienist does an excellent job. She shows a passion for what she does. She goes above and beyond to make sure her patients are comfortable.

name: Eula McClain
text: Had a very pleasant visit with Krisity the hygienist  she had an awesome personality and did a great job, also front staff was very nice as well!

name: BriAnna Gardner
text: If I could give this place a ZERO, I really would! I had 2 extractions done for my wisdom teeth on last week and I’m so happy that I was late or it would have been 4! I couldn’t imagine having 4 teeth pulled because this place sent me home with NO ANTIBIOTICS. Only pain pills! I noticed that the pain was beginning to be a bit unbearable so I called and ask if it was normal and if I could come in. The RECEPTIONIST proceeds to tell me that everything was normal. She’s not a dentist so I called back to schedule an appointment to come in. My appointment was at 4:00. I didn’t even make it to the back until 4:40 after asking if I was forgot about! A heavier set girl in at the front desk said very dry “well they had to squeeze you in” as if I was a burden or something!   She left for the rest of the day. The other RECEPTIONIST I asked ignored me when I told her I’d been there for 40 min and never even got up to see what was going on Smh! The entire time I’m sitting in the waiting area the vision department was clapping and dancing to music (imagine how that feels to hear loud clapping after having your teeth pulled) VERY unprofessional! I finally was in the back at this point. The assistant that helped me was very nice and patient! I hate the fact that I didn’t get her name but I loved her attitude and how she was willingly trying to help me! I was sent home with antibiotics! The same antibiotics they said they didn’t give after a extraction smh and steroids for my swelling. He also gave me more tabs for pain as if I’m a junky or something or if that was going to make me happy. I’m not going back at all. Thanks but no thanks. On another note! They need to get better receptionist or this place will be going down hill! Never ever again

name: Hermosa Travels
text: Mobile Bay Dental is HORRIBLE all the staff needs to go to customer service 101everytime I come here for an appointment there is new staff no consistency at all you can't build a patient and staff relationship which is very important to some patient who comes and get dental work every 6 months. And the new dentist  they have now is TERRIBLE Dr. Rich that is he has no people skills and he preformed a horrible job on my fillings leaving me unable to floss and with a uneven bit for 4 days I had to make appointment with another dentist Dr. Rich was also flirting with his assistant making me feel very uncomfortable I wouldn't recommend Dr. Rich to work on a animal's mouth so please DO NOT take your family here

name: Sandra Anderson
text:
My Visit today was great and easy thank you Kristy for making is easy and painless and took care of me and my x-rays nurse was nice as will..
Thank you all.

name: Jinna Muhammad
text: Kristy did a awesome job with my cleaning. Very knowledgeable and great conversation. She definitely kept me entertained and made me comfortable. Never had an issues at this office. Thanks Kristy and Mobile Bay Dental!

name: Brittany Carter
text: Kristy and her team at Mobile Bay Dental & Vision has indeed educated me and worked full positive energy. Even though the covid moment they had made things feel safe and welcoming. They have respected my time, addressed my oral issues, and left me with my smile on my face so my personality can be my autograph!

name: Terika Murrell
text: My cleanings are always on point. The best Kristy always have my smile 😃 together..

name: Happiness On Purpose
text: The dentists are awesome, front desk help...not really. Dry and very unfriendly and it seems that's acceptable because others are reporting the same and nothing changes.. Northcutt is full of friendly faces and Attitudes..

name: Brea Lang
text: It was an amazing experience Kristy was perfect she made me comfortable. The overall experience from the front desk to all staff in the back made my experience enjoyable. I love them🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

text: I love this dentist, very nice workers and sweet people. Very friendly and work well and can cooperate with kids. Kristy cleaned my teeth and she was very sweet , outgoing , and nice sense of humor. I highly recommend 😊

name: LauQuita Lee

name: bkelly66

name: Brittany Umbrello
text: Kristy is amazing! Love this dentist and staff. I could not be anymore pleased and would 100% recommend.

name: Curt K
text: Awesome folks! Dr. Perry and her staff are caring, personable and professional! Love my glasses!

name: Kimberly Theresa
text: We have been using Mobile Bay Dental & Vision in Semmes for 4 years now and couldn’t be happier. Both of our children LOVE going there. We have always had positive experiences there. The staff is amazing and has always treated us with nothing but kindness and respect. Dr. Perry was especially fantastic with my youngest during her recent eye exam. I cannot recommend this place enough.

name: xzavius hill
text: Highly recommend me, my kids and a few family members go. They make sure all of our needs are met and I’m always pleased with their services. If there’s anything wrong they’ll assure to correct it.. This is surely a place I would recommend...

name: Natel Matthews
text: I’ve been going here for sometime. Kristie my DH is great! The staff are friendly and informative!

name: Nurse 2008
text: This place is HORRIFYING the staff is unfriendly and let’s not talk about Dr. Rich he is unprofessional on so many levels and don’t know how to do his job properly had to go to another dentist to get dental work corrected p  please don’t take your family members to see Dr.Rich I wouldn’t allow him to work on my animals

name: Fearless Christian
text: Dr.Gast is the most amazing dentist ever.I thank God I went to him.Another dentist left me in bad shape and Dr.Gast helped me so much.He is a great dentist and a great person.

name: Theresa Tolbert

name: Stacy McInnis

name: Larry Bellamy

name: Lisa Walker

Amy the hygienist was sooo awesome with him as was Dr. Hankinson!! Thank you Mobile Bay Dental!  We will be back in October for the Vision exam. Looking forward to it!

name: Repent
text: I took my daughter to get her wire fixed at this location for the first time, and I hope we never have to go back to this location again for anything else. The girl at the front desk was sweet and also Brandy but I can't say the same for everyone else. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

name: Sarah Estes
text: The assistants were great but the dentist was a tad over confident and made it known that it was "casual jeans day" more often than not. A bit unprofessional and he was more concerned with what he was wearing than with actually cleaning teeth, which was quite odd.

name: Shaun Hamner
text:
Awesome customer service! Dr. Perry was incredibly informative; as well as Amanda. Queen was super fun to work with and somehow remembered my name and the exact glasses we looked at 2 WEEKS AGO! Will def recommend you ladies every chance I get!

Side note, coffee could be better.

name: Yolanda Hill
text: My experience here at Mobile Bay Dental and Vision was great.  My hygienist Kristy was great and thorough.

name: Krystle Thomas
text: I have been a patient for over 10 years and I love it here! Everyone is awesome. Hands down the best dentist in Mobile! Thanks for an awesome cleaning Kristi and Dr. Gast has me smiling from ear to ear! 😁😁🥰

name: Kristin Mullins
text: I highly recommend Mobile Bay Dental! From the beautiful office to friendly team, my experience was top notch! Kristy took the time to explain the cleaning process and was an absolute joy to converse with! Dr. Dabbs was very thorough and made sure to explain all options to help with my clenching problem. Overall a great experience!

name: Angela P.
text: This place is not the same since Dr Joshua  Dabbs left. I was not happy with the care received by one of the other doctors so I google searched for Dr Dabbs new location. Thankfully I found him at Advanced Dental Comfort, Fairhope, AL. I drive from Mobile to see him, very easy drive and now I'm back to receiving that exceptional and warm hearted care that I missed :)

name: Billy Bowyer
text: When we arrived they were having issues with their computer. However the professionalism with which the staff carried themselves, we never knew the computers were down until they told us. They were extremely prompt yet we never felt rushed. My daughter was nervous but due to the kind nature of all the staff she began to relax and actually enjoyed herself. The staff was kind, courteous and very informative. When you couple these attributes with the indoor playground, it's a Kidz Paradise wrapped in a dental office

name: Brittany Gamble
text: I love that I’m able to come right after work. Everyone here is so nice and hospitable. I had a great experience!  Christy was amazing and so patience! She was able to explain to me all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait for my next cleaning!! :)

name: Myeshia Smith
text: Dr Hankinson the owner and doctor at mobile bay dental in Semmes is very rude and so not kid friendly today was his second time being rude to my daughter once before he was rude to her at the bel air location my daughter was crying a little because she was scared to get teeth pulled and he told me he was not fixing to deal with that he didn’t even give my daughter a chance to calm down before he jumped up off his stool snatched his gloves off and walked out the room with no explanation he was extremely rude to us for the second time I will never take my daughter back to mobile bay ever again he has no patience for kids he told me once a bel air mall when my daughter cried he recommended the Semmes location because they were more kid friendly and now we go there this morning and his not kid friendly self was there I was extremely upset at how he treated us both times but today to find out he was the owner really took the cake for me

name: Monet Monet
text: The best dentist office I’ve ever been to!!! My 1 year old daughter felt so comfortable letting them assist her. No literally, you’ll fall IN LOVE with the staff! This is by far the most positive energy.. great atmosphere while waiting to be serviced.. very professional place of business with outstanding personality! They’re patient and they also make you so comfortable. I highly recommend this dentist office. Airport & Semmes location

name: Sara Pate
text: My children have been going to this dentist since they opened years ago... never had a problem, always very friendly, kind and helpful staff. Today on the other hand, I took all 3 of our kids in for their 6 mth checkup and cleaning. The hygienist was WONDERFUL.. the dentist/owner on the other hand was rude, arrogant, and crass. When he told me my oldest had a very deep cavity, I asked how it had gotten so deep in 6 mths, he chuckled and said oh we probably missed it the last time! Also when asking about dental issues that may arise with my daughter who has an autoimmune disease, I was met with incorrect, unsolicited medical advise infront of a room full of people that was very demeaning and humiliating! Needless to say I will be taking our business elsewhere.

name: Elizabeth Moses
text: Front desk was very welcoming! Dental hygienist were GREAT, especially Danielle!! we came in, they did their jobs and we got out at a good time. Highly recommend! Never a bad experience.

name: Liz Stringfellow
text: I’ve been waiting  for four months now for the vision Dr. to except the Medicaid they except Medicaid but not now. If you except Medicaid in the pass you should not stop because of a pandemic. Not right

resp.text: Our Belair Mall location is accepting all patients at this time. Please feel free to give us a call at 251-301-6555.

name: celeste Salazar
text: They called me back almost immediately and sat me in a room for TWO HOURS. After the first hour they numbed my mouth and then made me sit in there alone for another hour. Told the doctor I had been waiting for two hours and he dismissed me & they released me as a patient because I was annoyed of waiting two hours and waiting an hour with my mouth numb. Wasn’t gonna come back anyways 🤣✌🏼 Weak place frfr .

name: MrsTJay Johnson
text: I always enjoy my visits here at Mobile Bay Dental! They are so very nice and sweet! Always make me feel like I am at home! I love the way Patrica cleans my teeth!

name: Enocolis Lampkin
text: They are so nice, sweet and professional at the semmes location. kristy and Dr. Gasty  and staff was wonderful.

name: Vickie Collier
text: I have been taking my 2 girls to the one downtown and I give everyone there 5 ⭐'s. Now I take my grandkids to the one in Semmes. I'm so thankful that Dr. Hankinson expanded to other parts of Mobile County.

name: Denisse Lamastra
text: Both my kids are both dental patients here and the staff is always friendly and helpful. On my last visit, Gabby in Vision went the extra mile to help me as I was picking up a frame for my sons new glasses. She heard what I was looking for and helped me find it. She was patient and helpful. I appreciated that she was not in a rush just to get it done, but was attentive and giving me great customer service. I would 100% recommend this place for anyone with children.

name: Margaret Texmed
text: I Always leave here feeling great about my teeth. Danelle was amazing and so knowledgeable about her craft. Love that they all do their best to save my teeth. See you soon Mobile Bay Dental.

name: Kimberly Phillips
text: Love the staff of the dental and vision. It's very family friendly and the staff are very accommodating. It even has a little door for little kids to come in and feel independent.

name: Lori Oliver
text: This place is great! When I first walked in it was a little hectic, they have a play area for kids which is amazing, but the also have a adult only waiting room which was very nice. The staff here is top notch. Everyone from the girl at the desk that checked me in to the dentist was friendly and knowledgeable. I have a little anxiety when seeing any doctor and the dentist was kind and understanding of that. I had a tooth pulled, painless and unbelievably quick. I would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Mobile Bay dentist!

name: Heather Davis
text: The staff at mobile bay dental did a wonderful job for me and my children today. Danielle was the best, and I couldn’t have accomplished 3 cleanings at once without them.

name: christine bryan
text: Ashley did a Great job! Very thorough with cleaning, very informative and patient with my questions. Dr.Geiss was very nice. Look forward to next visit.

name: Jennifer delaune
text: Love this office! Dr. Perry is amazing! She explained things to me that I have never experienced before with any other optometrist. She really cares about her patients. All the staff was very sweet as well. We will definitely be back!!

name: Robin Andrews
text: I have been using Mobile Bay Dental for years. They are really great!! I always feel like they really care about my teeth & they have always been very friendly & the building is beautiful as well!!

name: Lamar Griffin
text:
most unprofessional business I've ever dealt with.
won't let me give zero stars.

do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

name: Jamarcus White
text: Had a Good Day Today. They Was Quick And Fast. Kristy was my hygienist and Educated Me On Things I Didn’t Know. Had a great Overall Experience

name: Liz Nguyen
text: Patricia was amazing. I learned a lot while she cleaned my teeth. It was painless also. I’ve never had such a great experience! I usually hate getting my teeth cleaned but she made it easy!

name: Vanessa
text: This place is amazing if you have kids. The staff is patient and caring, plus they have an indoor kids theater and playground.  Madison and Kelly made my daughter feel extra special and they took care of us quickly. They accept All Kids and have a nice waiting room. The kids dental area has seating for parents and vibrant saltwater fish decor.

name: Gail Shields
text: Dr. Gast and his assistant are AMAZING! I have had several dental issues, and he ALWAYS takes his time and does a remarkable job. He is extremely professional, and cares about his patients. His assistant does also. I wish I could give them both more stars, but he will forever be my dentist. His office staff is ALWAYS friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Gast and his staff.

name: Victoria Meeks
text: I love Dr Perry, and staff !!

name: bex bama
text:
I went to this dentist a few months ago to have a crown glued back in. It only took approximately 2 minutes, total. However, I was in the office well over 3 hours. When I left, the lobby lights were off, no staff was available to check me out. The crown hasn’t come out since but a patient’s time should be considered. The fact that crown is still holding is the only reason they get 1 star.
Now, I brought my mother in today for an extraction. Although she was called back just 7 minutes past her appointment time, I fear I will be waiting for them to finish the job till the lobby is closed yet again.
I, personally, will not continue seeing the dentists at Mobile Bay Dental because I do value my time. Apparently, the staff at this particular dentist does not.

name: James Bosarge
text: it was a great experience!

name: Cassandra Dumas
text: The dentist was super nice and kept coming back to check on my daughter just to see her reaction of her new caps which she loves. Just putting in the extra effort was amazing. Kelly was super sweet and she gets five stars from us any day. Thanks so much for a wonderful experience. We love you Kelly!!!!!

name: ADAM N
text: Mobile Bay Dental is the best dentist's office I've ever been to. Super clean. Friendly staff. Great service.

name: Shagy Seven
text:
Great care, made sure I was comfortable. Was one of the best visits I've had to the dentist! The price was also more fair than others I shopped around with. Was fortunate enough they could squeeze me in on a Friday on short notice.
I will definitely be back for the rest of the work I need! Thanks to the staff I had working on me!

name: Manuella Coleman
text: I went to the location in the mall and everyone is nice friendly and helpful. The dentist is very kind and considerate of how much pain you are in and tries to be gentle. I am definitely going to come back.

name: Sharon Shula
text: A wonderful day at the dentist. Kristy was helpful and friendly.

name: Melia Nicholson-Franklin
text: I love the staff and the facility. My kids do also!! Very adult and kid friendly!! Thanks for all the help Danielle!!!

name: Jamie Newsome
text: This dentist office deserves more then 5 stars. Awesome staff, very clean and all around great place! If you need a dentist go see them!

name: kristen holcombe
text: I had a good visit as usual! Kristy made me feel comfortable and she was very knowledgeable!😊

name: Krystal Littrell
text: My kids and I love coming to this location!!! It's kid friendly on one side and then the adult side is calming and relaxing. The staff is amazing and friendly. I've had a ton of work done on my mouth after I had an accident in December and they've made everything simple and easy and explain all my procedures in terms that I can understand. Truly recommend this location for the entire family.

name: Christina Daughtry
text: My eight year old had a horrific experience a couple of years ago when having dental work done. The young lady, Jessica, who helped him was very friendly and understanding. After administering nitrous oxide, my son calmed down and the procedure was completed very quickly and painlessly. I am extremely grateful for the patience, understanding and level of professionalism I experienced during our visit and would recommend this dental practice to all of my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Well, I will never go back there, because they charge you taxes on your total  bill instead of charging you taxes on what you pay!!!! I ended up paying $100 extra then I would have if I went somewhere else!!! They need to  inform you more and explain it better!!! Because I would have took my prescriptions somewhere else. I have been getting glasses for 5 years and I have ever paid taxes on the total!!! I always paid on what my portion was!!! Please read all the reviews before choosing this vision care!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback and for the opportunity to allow us to explain the way that we charge our patients for Sales Tax on ophthalmic materials. Our policies are strictly adherent to the guidelines set forth by the Alabama Department of Revenue. We can only control the activities of our offices, and cannot comment on what policies may be in place at other practices you previously visited. At Mobile Bay Vision, we are committed to providing you with excellent care, and we understand how frustrating paying taxes can be. Unfortunately, we do not have any influence on what state law dictates. We can only follow the laws set forth by our lawmakers.

name: Jessica Folse
text: I love the entire building!! The front desk girls are the best! I came in with 3 of my kids and one of them was my 2 year old son, first time at the dentist, who was nearing the end of potty training and after they finished with him, making his first experience an easy one, and while I was in the back myself, they watched him play on the playground. WELL, he had an accident and peed all the way down the slide and they did not even hesitate! They shut the playground down climbed in that slide and cleaned up the entire thing while I was still in the back! They never once made me feel like it was my fault and they actually blamed it on themselves for giving him water. They are always so sweet and accommodating for me with my 5 kids. As long as this place is open I'll never go anywhere else! And Callie Taylor, Dr. Q and Dr. Gast are the best!

name: Bianca White
text: I don't even know where to start. I feel like the staff was very unprofessional. People were constantly in and out of the room, asking questions, getting supplies having personal conversations over my mouth. Which would have been better had they not been having problems fitting the crown but I felt as though they should have been more focused on that than on greys anatomy. We were there for 3 hours for a fill in and a crown. When it was time to check out there was only one person at the desk and a line of people waiting. When asked if there was assistance available the front desk clerk just told us to call back and schedule an appointment if necessary. Which isn't what we needed but we ended up leaving anyway. Definitely won't be going back.

name: Aaliyah Taylor
text: The staff in the vision center here is amazing! Ms. Leah and Brandy were so helpful and kind. I will definitely be back!

name: Water Staff
text: Great staff! The hygienist, Danielle did an excellent job and was very helpful with questions that I had.

name: Brantley Cook
text:
Wonderful dentistry. Assistants were very helpful and provided a pleasant experience. Calm atmosphere. Great service. I can't wait to come back, actually. 9.5/10

P.S.-Ask for Alicia and Gina! They tended to me and were absolutely wonderful!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dr. Terry and her assistant were great, as was the woman in the glasses area. They were very patient and explained things very thoroughly and were very understanding with a little bit of fear on the part of my family member. A woman in the glasses area brought out about a dozen other choices that they did not have room to display. I was put on hold for 13 minutes, however when I called to confirm our appt., at which point they almost hung up on me before I could actually get all of the information. And then it turned out that they also did not confirm the location, and so when we arrived at the place that I made the appointment for, they told me that the appointment was for the other location. Fortunately, they were not busy and were able to go ahead with the exam at location where we were. All of that could have been resolved though, with simply slowing down during the phone call, and being more thorough. Or use text to confirm! Great once you get there.

name: Laura Coletta
text: The doctors and hygienists are pretty awesome but the girls at the front desk, not that much.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Great service and Kristy was my hygienist and she is awesome!  Would highly recommend this place!

name: Minh Tran
text: The purpose of my visit was for an extraction. Everyone was very polite and friendly and before I knew it everything was finished. Would highly recommend this location and the wonderful staff.

name: Caylei Hicks
text: This has been my girls dentist since 2012 and we will never go anywhere else! They are always so kind, professional, fast, and friendly! They always make my girls feel at home and comfortable with any procedure being done!!

name: shane533
text:
Everyone was great and made going to the dentist fun.

Christie was the best.

name: Mason Andrew
text: I had a really good experience. The doctor took her time with my exam and Danielle helped me with my glasses. I would recommend everyone to see Dr Perry.

name: Shemeka Harper
text: I gave 1 stars because it's been a pleasure working with them . The problem is with payments in between the 2 offices and time wasted since they cant get their financial team together . I have 2 daughters with braces and the same issue . They're payment are current and when it's time for the braces to come off and the bill is paid in full , the mall location sends you to the semmes location and upon arrival there is suddenly a 400 dollar bill that pops out of nowhere . Just today we went for my youngest to have her hard where removed and was told we have a 380 dollar bill due from 2017 .... really ???? Mind you the bill had to be paid in full before the appointment could be scheduled for the hardware removal so how is this even possible ... absolute RIP off of 400 per person when it's time for removal. This is not once but twice for us. This time I'm going to the Better Buisness Bureau

name: Leigh Foster
text: I love this place. The playground is great for kids. I had an eye exam and loved Dr Perry. Danielle was awesome helping me with glasses.

name: Beth Babin
text: The staff are always pretty friendly and the office is amazing. Unfortunately the dentist doesn't seem like he should be working with children. The past two times I have been in,  my son complained of not being numb when they started the procedure and the dentist flat out ignored him.  The first visit (for a pulled tooth) the dentist eventually stopped and gave him another shot, after which he was fine. This 2nd time, we were told we were the ONLY patients in the office, but the dentist seemed inconvenienced to even come in the room,  didn't say 2 words to me and acted in a rush to leave. He started a filling and my son raised his hand and made noises to let him know he could feel it, but the dr kept going and told the nurses "He's fine." Then when my son finally jumped & grabbed his hand, he got aggravated and said to refer us to a pediatric dentist to be sedated. Very rudely made a point to say he wasn't even touching his teeth when he jumped. He didn't even offer to give him another shot or try to comfort him/talk to him about what he was feeling. My son is 11, knows what he can feel & has never had this problem with other dentists. :( I am very disappointed that an office so heavily geared towards children & close to home, has such an impatient & unkind dentist.

name: Fred Peace II
text:
Heads up!
The Optometrist’s operation in the back is one
*gotcha* after another.
They didn’t disclose the price could go up from $189 for the contact lens fitting until after the contact lens fitting started.
*gotcha*
They didn’t disclose that this Optometrist chooses to require a follow up visit for ALL contact lens fittings. I’ve worn contacts for over 30 years...never have I been required to do a follow up...until they have me on the hook for $189...oh, it costs $40 to miss an appointment at a place that accepts walk-ins...so never make an appointment with these people.
*gotcha*
You will have to come back in a week or they will withhold your prescription so basically you will lose $100. They know the follow up visit is not something that all Optometrists do, so the follow-up visit seems worth a mention.
Oh, FYI
They did not disclose that the contact lenses had to be in your eyes for 4 hrs before they will perform the follow up so you will have plenty of time to kill if you’re an honest person.
*gotcha*
then they dated the prescription the day of the initial visit. So, no bonus for coming all the way back for the follow up. That seems to just justify them charging $70 more than their nearest competitor.

The staff in the front where the glasses are made were very friendly and helpful. They did a great job on my $313 glasses. I was really impressed with their utilization of the digital system to measure my pupils and adjust my daughter’s glasses so both of us had a great fit.

I expected to pay a premium for the convenience of having the glasses immediately...but the people at the Optometrists practice really go the extra mile to beat out all the convenience. I wouldn’t recommend coming here unless you had an existing prescription. Otherwise, the Optometrist staff really goes out of their way to not tell you anything...or help you out at all.

name: Patricia Kenny
text: Totally pleased with the exam I received; it was a very thorough eye exam.  My only angst is how they handle insurance payments if something found during the exam is considered "medical" instead of vision-related.  Even with them being a "in-network" provider, I still had to pay out of pocket close to $100 for an office visit.  Also, making the appointment was confusing, as LensCrafters appears to be totally different than the actual optometrist-- they just share space and provide a $15 discount if you purchase glasses from LensCrafters.  And, the eye glasses are extremely overpriced!

name: Derek Watson
text: Scheduled an exam for contacts. Was told on phone if it was a medical visit it would not be covered by insurance, but as I said I went in for a standard eye exam for contacts. They did everything Walmarts Eyecare does except measure your eye. When it was OVER, they told me it turned into a medical exam. At no point during the process did these scam artist inform the patient they were changing the visit to a medical exam. From other reviews it seems this is standard practice for this company. I recommend staying far away from BRADLEY EYE CARE before you are the next victim. Luckily I reported this scam to my insurance company right away and have appealed the charges. I learned to stick with my hometown eye doctor for visits and take my prescriptions to Walmarts to get my glasses. Thank you Bradley Eye Care.
